174a6(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa dang /gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang //mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa
174a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
174b1(dkon brtsegs): /dro ba chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston to//'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can yongasu
174b2(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i
174b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub semis dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
174b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs
174b5(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan mongs po thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams
174b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nyi byar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shesu 'gyur ro//byang
174b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral
175a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zho 'gras pa med pa'i snyoms su 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stong
175a2(dkon brtsegs): rje'i tshogs ni yongs su mi skyo ba'i semo su 'gyuraro//dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyis kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyuraro//btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rje su chags pa
175a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /khong khro ba spong bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshegs ni sgrib pa spong bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par
175a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bar 'gyur ro//byang chub seMda' rnams kyi dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshogs ni byams pa'i las chud mi za bar 'gyur ro//
175a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par 'gyuraro//blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par 'gyuraro//rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don rtogs pa'i rje su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//dran pa
175a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni lus dang /tshor ba dang sems dang chos la so sor rtogs par 'gyuraro//yang dag par spong ba'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong
175a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur//dbang po lnga'i tshogs ni dbang po
175b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dam pa mchog ma yin pa shes par 'gyur//skyabyas lnga'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs no chas thams
175b2(dkon brtsegs): cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyuraro//lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'dra' bar 'gyur//'dod pa'i chags ni 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid du
175b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//sos yang dge bar rig pa'i tshugs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod par 'gyur ro//ston pa'i tshogs ni gzhan dag la rag me lus pa'i ye shes 'gyur
175b4(dkon brtsegs): re//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgor 'gyur ro//bsam pa'i tsho gas ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyuraro//lhag pa'i bsam
175b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyuraro//sbyor ba'i tshogs ni ci rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chug par 'gyuraro//nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshogs ni ji skad bos pa'i chos
175b6(dkon brtsegs): chud mi gson pa 'gyur//bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog
175b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par 'gyur//bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i chags ni sangs rgyas kyi snying yong su dag par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas
176a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
176a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bshad//tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyi
176a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas phyogs na/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje thogs nas 'dug par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
176a4(dkon brtsegs): to//ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa
176a5(dkon brtsegs): ni/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tsha rmya ba ltar na/bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/bcom ldan 'das byung
176a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /ye shes kyi tshogs kyi nang du 'dus shing rje su zhugs par 'chil bar bgyi
176a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni rnam par sgrub pa thams cad rnam par bsgrub po//ye shes
176b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
176b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol
176b3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do//ye shes kyi tshogs kyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs paro bgyid de/byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di gnyis ni
176b4(dkon brtsegs): lam thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba lags so//byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa na bdud sdig can gyis thul bar dka'o//bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
176b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa thams cad ston te mi'i tshe ba bo//de naste byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lhag na rdo rje la
176b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smraso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring po nye ba na 'dug pa yin na/gseng ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba
177a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' mamam nganmtshams sa mthamasama.a mthasams ma ma
177a2(dkon brtsegs): badz+ri gnas gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin na/de ma yin pa'i sems can tha ma lta smos kyang ci dgos pa lngas rtsoms te//
177a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod slebs par gyis shig/de skad ces smras pa dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gres
177a4(dkon brtsegs): kyokyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje tsang mi smra bar khas blangs par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos pas byang
177a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
177a6(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chad par gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo
177a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes spro bar mdzad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pi
177a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan par 'dod de/khyod la ngas bskul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
177b1(dkon brtsegs): stu rnams te/'khor 'dor skabs par gyis shig/de s+yAd ces bAkaSh+Ta stsal pa dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
177b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams
177b3(dkon brtsegs): la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam zhig bstan pa bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyin mtshan mo mun+da pa mun nag ge nang na mar me'i mthus
177b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad gda' ba de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba
177b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam bstan par bgyi'o//de nas gsing ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/byang chub sems
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdam
177b7(dkon brtsegs): zothos nas mi sdang mi skrag/skrag par mi 'gyur bar 'khor legs par 'khod cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
178a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor la smras pa/phrogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi gsungs te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/las bsam gyis mi khyab
178a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//yang grogs po dag gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par
178a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi rnam par bkod pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi
178a4(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so//grogs po dag de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam/gyis mi khyab pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/mi sdang
178a5(dkon brtsegs): mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o//thos nas lhag par dga' ba dang /dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher bskyed par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
178a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhi ba'i blo bros kyis/ci ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba nyan pa la mos par gyur cing /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor du
178a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/byang chub
178b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras//zhi ba'i blo gros de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yod la zung shig dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
178b2(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros gang tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems
178b3(dkon brtsegs): dpar gyur pa na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de tshun chad kho na byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug 'dug nabyang chub sems dpa'i lus
178b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'am/lus tshul 'chos po kho bos nam yang ma mthong ngo //ngag 'gyur ba'am/ngag gi kha gsag kyang ma thos/sems 'gyur ba 'amo/sems g.yo ba yang
178b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ngo //de lus kyi spyod lam gyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/tshig tu ni mi smra'o//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/de'i lus kyi spyod
178b6(dkon brtsegs): yul ma mtha' yas mu med par snang ste/zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thaMd kyi lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed pa/byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub
178b7(dkon brtsegs): cing sgrim pa med par gnas so//'di lta ste bsam gtan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can+d+ha rnams la bsam gtan gyi spyod lam ston to//rgyud kyi sgra dang /glu dbyangs kyis 'dul
179a1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sems can rnams la rgyud kyi sgra dang /glu'i dbyangs kyis spyod lam dang /khye'us 'dul bya'i sems can rnams la khye'u'i spyod lam dang /bu mos 'dul
179a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can rnams la bu mo'i spyod lam dang /bud med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams lo bud med kyi spyod lam dang /skyes pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes
179a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod lam dang /gzhon nus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gzhon nu'i spyod lam dang /bar mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bar ma'i spyod lam dang /rgan pos
179a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang /yan lag mi tshang bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la yan lag ma tshang ba'i spyod la mo dang /gdol pa rkang
179a5(dkon brtsegs): lag chad pas gdul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad pa'i spyod lasra dang /lkugs pa dang 'phye bos gdul ba'i sems can rnams la lkugs pa dang /'phye bo'i
179a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam dang /long ba dang /'on pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/long ba dang /'on pa'i spyod lam dang /sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i
179a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la/sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi spyod lam dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mis 'dul ba'i sems can
179b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/dud 'grob skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i spyod lam dang /lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/lha'i spyod ldum dang /klu dang /gad
179b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang lto phye chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin
179b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang /brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi spyod lam dang /tshangs pas 'dul
179b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can la tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang /'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten skyong ba'i spyod lam dang /'khor los sgyur bas 'dul bri seM na rnams la//
179b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyod lam dong /dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/dge slong gi spyod lam dang /dge slong mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/dge
179b6(dkon brtsegs): slong ma'i spyod lam dang /dge bsnyen gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/dge bsnyen gyi spyod lam dang /dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/dge bsnyen
179b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i spyod lam dang /nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/nyan thos kyi spyod la mo dang /rang sa ng+yas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyi
180a1(dkon brtsegs): lam dang /byang chub sems dpa 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam dang /de bzhin gshogs pas 'dul ba'i sems can
180a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te/gzugs med pa ni mu gtogaso//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang /kha dog dang /
180a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang /kha dog dang //spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing yongs su mi rtog par kun tu gnas so//de la byang
180a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi spyod lam ston mod kyi lus kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//lus kyis lus kyi las byed maud
180a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi/lus kyi dben pa yang mi 'dor ro//de lus yongasu dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed//lus la mi lta bas
180a6(dkon brtsegs): sha za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/shi'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gis lus las de dag la bstabs nas/bdag srog dang phral te//
180a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do//khrag 'thung po rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do//rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par byed do//gzi byin za ba rnams la gzi byin sbyin
180b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do//zhi ba'i blo gr-is ng+ge stAr sha'i ljongs spyod ci skyed phyur de drug thams cad bdag gi lus las bskyabs te/srog dang bral nas sems can de dag la sbyin par byed nga/
180b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus tshad med pa ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjesu 'gro bas ma zad//de'i lus mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma zad pa mngon par
180b3(dkon brtsegs): sgrubs pas rab tu rig par 'gyuraro//de lus kyi sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed de/gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan mar
180b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdig pa ston te/de la sems can de dag chags pa skyes nas/byugs shing kun tu byugs te/
180b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag par du 'jog go/de dag skyes bu de dag gi spang du son pa dang /rnyis shing skams nas 'cha ba'i dus byed//mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par gyur pas/skyes bu de dag des
180b6(dkon brtsegs): yid byung nas bor te//song ba dang /shi ba'i ro de dag nyid las skyes bu de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir me ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu
180b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo //yang zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te//sor mo'i rtse mos yungs 'brul
181a1(dkon brtsegs): /rgyu dunan du rgyun pa gdugs nas//khyes da /srog pa 'aM sa pa rlom ga nga mos gas sa kyad smos pang po rgyu/
181a2(dkon brtsegs): ma sa myi gi cig tu rA hA / slong po pa byed rgyas pa byung ba /de na shegs pal
181a3(dkon brtsegs): gle gA na kyi ma spyod sde ba gi spyod//de bzhin ga sa pal spyod byu b+h+r-i k+Sha sa su/ma
181a4(dkon brtsegs): sa byung bu/do ba gyur sangs rgyas kyi byung gang gi'o// na pa da snang brgyan po ba
181a5(dkon brtsegs): nas ma m-i sa ni'i byang chu sems pa'i tshul chos tu mang ba mtho sems cad pa gas song ba tha~M byed pa
181b1(dkon brtsegs): da rdzogs par byung chub tu sa smrad//dur+m+mam+b+ha dang /rgyugs pa dang /drogs pa rlom par sems can rnams pa yang bdag gis gzugs can pa rgya chen po //
181b2(dkon brtsegs): srung med kyi bung /phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs ston te/der snyoms can de dag sprul pas 'jigs smug nas/byang chub sems dpa' del mngon dar 'dud cing phyug 'tsha/
181b3(dkon brtsegs): del chos kyang nyen par 'dod do//gang yang srid chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po'i srog chags pargya snong du mas gang bar gyur pa de yang /byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa
181b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po des bdag gi lus chen po shi zhing dus las 'dres par ston te//dang yang sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis tso tsam du 'dod par sha la zos nas
181b5(dkon brtsegs): cho mthar phyin te/'che ba'i dus su gyur pA/shrI nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du spyod//de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du
181b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyur 'gyur//de ni byang chub sem+b+ha sa dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yong su dag pa'i phyir d+he/bangadag 'a che ba'i dus su gyur nas lus la sems can gang dge
181b7(dkon brtsegs): gis zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho risu skye ba nas/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur cig/ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste/tshul khrims da
182a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dro bsam pa 'grub 'dod pa grub/smyon pa grub po/zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis wAr byang chub sems dpe'i lus tshad myed nang mnga'/
182a2(dkon brtsegs): yas par khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs po ni mkhas bskyor ba 'di nyid du grong khyer
182a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyud khri bzhi stong ba phrag bzhi byung ste/de na grong dang /chang 'dus dang /ri khrod stong phrag mang po srog chags bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gnas pa yod de//zhi ba'i
182a4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/der sems can dag nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur nas/phal cher lus shu ba can dang /lus
182a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa dang //'bras dang /phol mig dang /me drabal dang /thor bu dang /rlung dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan gyi nad rnams kyis rgyas par gyur to//de'i tshe sman pa
182a6(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/brtson par gyur kyang sems can de dag gi nad de bsal bar mi nuso//der sems can dri dag gis gus
182a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyad ma rnyed de skyabs med nas 'di skad du/nad 'di las ni thar byed pa//lha 'am klu'am dri za'am//gnod sbyin dang ni mi yang rung //mi ma yin pa su zhig yod//
182b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyun 'du smra ga/sa du mas pa sa spyad//smre smon pa sma m+b+ha// / ga na//
182b2(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAk+Sha sgrub pa 'di/de'i tshe de'i dus na/sgra'i dbang po brgya sbyin mag ba 'ang sa shes bya bar gyur te/dus lha'i mig rnam par dag bye/mri mas
182b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas sems can de dag nud sna tshogs mang pos btab pa yang mdzad/lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i lus 'das pas khu tsho chen po 'don pa'i sgra yang thos so//des
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong zhing thos nas /snying rje chen po bskyed/de 'di snyam du bdag ci nas sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gis gan su 'gyur bar bya'o//skyabs med pa dang /
182b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas des de ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na/grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dang /
182b6(dkon brtsegs): cing yang myi ring ba zhig tu srog tshogs nges po zhes bya ba rdzas te skyes nas/steng gi bar snang lce'i dug ste/'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad la tshig su bcad pas bskul
182b7(dkon brtsegs): ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba ni/srog chags nges pa zhes bya yod//de yo shal sus zos pa//de ni nad las thar bar 'gyur//'jigs par ma byed skrag par ma byed par//
183a1(dkon brtsegs): /ji ltar 'dod par de yi sha long shig/de la khro med gshe med gnod sems med//'dzam bu gling 'dir de ni sman yin no//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na
183a2(dkon brtsegs): grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /tshong 'dus dang /ri khrod de dag na sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gi sgra de thos nas/grong khyer chen po ku ru gaM la ba
183a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /srog tshogs kyi rnam pa des pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/srog chags nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la sha zad par ma
183a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/des pas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bden pa gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur zhing //bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur pa//bden pa des ni
183a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi lus las sha/'dir ni nams kyang zad par ma gyur cig/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar phyogs bzhi'i sems can nad pa ji skad yod pa de dag gis srog chags gyi rnam
183a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nges pa'i lus la sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/yang bcad yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar
183a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can ji snyed kyis srog chags kyi rnam po nges pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu nad thams cad zhi bar gyur te/nad med cing bde bo dang /nyams pa med par gyur to//
183b1(dkon brtsegs): drinas mthar gyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gyi nad thams cad bsal bar gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros de na sa 'dzam bu gling gi smyos pa dang /bud mod dang /khyo'u dang /bu mo dag 'di snyam dusas//
183b2(dkon brtsegs): te/srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar cing nad med par byas te/bde zhing nyams pa med por byas kyis/bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i gnas shig/
183b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam nas de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa gal ba der song nas thal mo sbyar te/srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa la tshig su bcad de smras pa/
183b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs//khyod ni bdag cag sman pa sman//khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba//khyod kyis bdag cag bka' stsol cig/de nas srog chags kyi rnam
183b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nges pas lus de mi snang bar byas te/bdag gi rgya byin gyi lus su 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshigasu bcod pas smras pa/nga la nor dang zas skom dang //gser dang
183b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bru rnams dgos pa med/thams cad lhan cig 'thun par ni//dge ba bcu'i las lam bsrungs//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//byang chub smon lam brtan pa thog//
183b7(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i dngos po nyid kyi sems//gcig la gcig kyang byams pa bskyed//brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos//sems can de dag rab dga' ste//shin tu yongs su dag pa
184a1(dkon brtsegs): yi//dge ba bcu'i las lam blangs//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ngo tshun chad 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo
184a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed las tha na sems can gcig kyang log par ltung bar song ba mi dra no//de tshun chad de dag thams cad shi 'phos te/shi bi'i dus byas nas kyang /bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten
184a3(dkon brtsegs): du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/de dag yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/yang dag par
184a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod nas/do la kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha gcig gis ni chos rnams
184a5(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang /lus kyi las yongs su dag pa ste/
184a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas na/sems can tshad med pa grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas//gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byung
184a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gas la 'di skad ces smras so//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mo shegs pa/sra ba brtan pa 'chi 'pho med pa/brdzus te skye bo ste/
184b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' ya mamatam ngan mam nyam sa sa mthamasams a na than thasamathas cam tham mabamatham ma tham tha ma/ thamamatham ma mamam ma mam sa aH ya mamamam tham mas/tham ma yas
184b2(dkon brtsegs): /sgras ni gas pas 'dus rnaMs ma na nas su 'dus parjo dbadwags myur ya //lus mo 'dzugs pas 'dus pa sasam+b+han+dan rnams la/'dul ba'i dbang gi phy-ir chu
184b3(dkon brtsegs): skro du mi 'jig ste/mes mi tshig mtshan gyis mi tshugs shing rjes dz+ra d+ha wAr sra ning brtan te mi glegs pa'o//zhi badz+ra blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sa kyis
184b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang su sbyin par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi sems mi t+tegalus lce lus kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rab tu shos//lus kyi dben po'i'amatshanas
184b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid shes so//lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gnyi su mi byed de/lus kyi dben pa'i
184b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de na chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do//de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rje su 'jug/de rang gis lus kyi dben pa'i
184b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan da dang /sems can thams byed kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam pa myed de//darang gis lus kyi ston pa'i mtshan nyi dang /snrums can thams cad kyi
184b8(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /chos kyi dbyid skyid dben pa'i mtshan nyid du na so//ches phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
185a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rje su 'thob po//de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes//
185a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so//de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes//
185a3(dkon brtsegs): so//chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so//de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar
185a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i de bzhin nyid shes te/'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do//'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de
185a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do//phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas
185a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do//kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
185a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin nyid do//'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid//mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhi
185b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin no//rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang /de lta bu nyid dang /gzhan ma yin/
185b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin nyid dang /mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /mi 'byung ba nyid dang /rtsod pa med pa nyid dang /gzugs med pa nyid//de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de/gzugs
185b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//ji ltar de bzhini nyid gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs tha~Md kyang sa gzugs med pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la
185b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs de ston kyang de bzhin nyid gzugasu mi byed do//de gzugs med cing rtsod pa med kyang lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/de bzhin nyid kyang 'khrugs par mi byed//de bzhin
185b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rtog go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gis lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go//lus ni shin tu ma skyes pa nyid
185b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pas lus thams cad ni lus med par yang dag par mthong ngo //lus thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rab tu sheso//shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrub
185b7(dkon brtsegs): bo//de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs pas chos kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te//phung po dang /khams dang skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin//de chos kyi sku rab tu phye bas na mthong bas
186a1(dkon brtsegs): ma' mamamatshams sa mthasama.a mthatha thasamathas mamam tam tham tham ma.a/mamatan mam
186a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi don byed do//thos pa dang reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dador na/sman pa'i rgyal ba
186a3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyis/rtsi thams cad bsdus te/rtsi'i shing mang po las bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/bam+b+ha ni sdug pa legs par byas te/legs par zin cing legs par
186a4(dkon brtsegs): byi dor byas pa de 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba 'am/'greng ngam/'dug gam/nyal yang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do//der nad pa gang btsun pa btsun pa rgyal
186a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/rgyal po'i bu 'am/tshong dpon nam/khyim bdag gam/blon po 'am/rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po
186a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho byed kyis sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad nas/de dag phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad byung ste/nad med cing bde la nyams pa med par 'gyur ro//zhi ba'i blo gros gang
186a7(dkon brtsegs): sman po gzhan li med pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba'i shes pa la ltos/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus rab
186a8(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba yang sems can bud med dang /skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis yongasu gdungs pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis lus
186b1(dkon brtsegs): na rog ma thug tu de dag gtsun rmongs pa n+tu sa r+b+ba dz+nyAn chung par 'gyur//smras maung su gdung ba dang bral ba sa ngan sa//don 'di ltar byang chub sems da 'di nyid kyi spyan
186b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi skyon lam shin tu dge pa'i phyir ro//zhi ba'i blo gas chos kyi skus rang tu bya ba'i phyir//'di snyeng byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyi gsang de'o//zhi ba'i rlo gas byang chub sem
186b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyod pa ma yin/khams kyis za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus 'chi ba ma yin te/de zas thams cad yongasu shes pa dang /
186b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas sems can la sring bad+d+he ba'i phyir zas pa'o//de zas zla'ang med pa ma yin za'ang khong du 'jug par mi byed//chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis mi nyams
186b5(dkon brtsegs): snyis su mi nyam so//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang chi'i phye ba dang /'byung ba med kyang sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i
186b6(dkon brtsegs): byi skye bo dang /'chi 'pho dang /'byung ba yang ston to//de 'chi bo yid ches thams cad la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rab tu shes //'byung
186b7(dkon brtsegs): yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so//skye yang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu shes so//de chos kyi sku dang ldan//chos kyi na dang ldan/
187a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi stobs dang ldan zhing chos la ston pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam
187a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i sku/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku//
187a3(dkon brtsegs): dpe med pa 'dra ba med pa dag pa dri ma med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sku/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku/rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i sku/rang bzhin
187a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis ma byung ba'i sku/sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel ba'i sku/sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang /chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan /
187a5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la nges par btags pa'i sku/phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i namakha' khyab pa'i sku/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sku/mtha'
187a6(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa'i sku/'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sku/mi g.yo zhing rlom sems maud pa'i sku/gnas pa dang /mi gnas pa dang /mi g.yo ba thob
187a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku/gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste/sa'i khams
187b1(dkon brtsegs): mam matsham sa sa mthamasam/a mthatha thasamathas mamama' thamamatham/mam
187b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu bya ba ma yin//chu'i khams kyis ma yin/me'i khams kyis ma yin/rlung gi khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ma byung ba kun nas ma byung ba'o//
187b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba tshon pa rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'o//'byung ba ma yin/'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'o//'jig rten thams cad deng mi mthun pa'o//mig las
187b4(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba'o//rna ba la mi gnas pa'o//snas shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o//lces rab tu ma phye ba'o//lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o//yid kyis nye bar sprad pa ma
187b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'o//sems dang mi 'jug pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi 'jug pa mi ldog rjesu mi 'jug pa ste/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni de 'dri'o//
187b6(dkon brtsegs): de las byang chub sems dpas dri bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dge pa la spyod cing /stong gsum gyi stong chen
187b7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/gleng bzhi pa'ang rung /'dzam bu'i glang yang rung /grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong brdal dang /yul 'khor dang /pho brang 'khor
187b8(dkon brtsegs): de ji snyed yod pa thams cad du/byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar yang byed la/bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro//de mthong bar yang byed la
188a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar snang ba yang med do//mthong bar mi byed pas kyang mthong bar snang ngo //mthong ba dang thos pa dang /rtog pa dang rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba
188a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin no//sems can yongs su smin par bya bas rab tu phye ba yin yang /lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las kyang mi nyams yongasu mi nyams so//
188a3(dkon brtsegs): de lus mi rtag pa dang /lus sdug bsngal ba dang /lus bdag med par yang sems can rnams la ston la/lus kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid kyang rab tu shes so//de lus ra
188a4(dkon brtsegs): tu dbye ba yang sems can rnams la ston la/rgyu gang dang dmigs pa gang dag gis lus mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag kyang byed pa pa med pa
188a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshor ba po med par yang dag par rje su ma thong ngo //lus rtsa dang /shing dang /rtsig pa dang /lam dang mig yor lta bur yang rab tu shes shong /de lus kyi
188a6(dkon brtsegs): las yongasu dag par yang sems can rnams la ston te/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar mye mdzad tshun chadabyang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis gsang
188a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /lus kyi las yongasu dag pa'o//de bas lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bskal pa brgya stong ngam/
188b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang lhag par bstan to//zhi bo'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba glang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad par ma/
188b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//nges pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////bam po gnyis
188b3(dkon brtsegs): par gzhan yong gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba
188b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /ngag gi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyang de snyed//byang chub sems
188b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs ji snyed par sgra la/'jug pa'ang de snyed do//sems can de dog gi sgra brjod pa dang /tshig gi lam brjod po dang /nges pa'i tshig dang /brda' dang /smra ba
188b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /yang dag par smra ba dang /mtshan ma dang /spyod pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal brjod pa ji snyed pa'i sgra la 'jug pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
188b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste/tha ni srin bu dang /sbrang bu dang /sha sbrang dang /sbrang ma dang /phye ma leb kyi sgra dag la'ang ye shes ma thong ba 'jug go/sgra'i rnam
189a1(dkon brtsegs): /par rig pa bsgrags pa ji lta bus sems can de dag gi lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam par rag/
189a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrag pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung //'di la 'di ni chos nyid yi ni he/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//ji ltar sems can tha ma gang yang med//
189a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar skyes pa'i rab te dpag tu med//skal pa brgya snyed bshad kyang mtha' ma med//bsam yas de dag ji ltar bshad par bya//skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid
189a4(dkon brtsegs): che ba'i tshig/sems dang bsam pa rgya cher rab ston pa//nam malnga' lta bur gang med bri med pa//'on kyang dpe dron ldan po bshad par bya//zhi ba'i blo gros byang
189a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshig ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /brgya byin gyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang //lha dang /klu dang /
189a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byon pa dang /sems can thams cad
189a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa yin te/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis ma smad tshig/
189b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba med cing dri mod na mkha' bzhin//sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan pa dag/de dag brjod pa rnams la nan tan nyon//byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang /
189b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms rab bshad de//tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i sgra phyung bas//legs bshad des ni tshangs pa tshim par byed//gang dag brgya byin rol mo yid
189b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong sgra//de dag de yi sgra brjod zil gyis non//rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni//chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dpag med 'byung //mi 'am tsa'i sgra dag gang
189b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa//de bas de yi sgra mchog phun sum tshogs//de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed//de yi tshig gis mi ci dga' bar 'gyur//'dod pa'i khams na yid 'ong sgra yod pas///
189b5(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra dang lha yi sgra mang po//chos kyi don sbyor dge bar ldan pa yi//de yi tshig gis kun du tshim par byed//mi yi 'dren pa yi ni tshig thos nas//'dod chags
189b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu zhi//gti mug g.yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa zhi//don rnams gtan la phebs shing the tshom med//gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang gnas pa//
189b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed//mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni//'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur zhes byang chub tshol//klu dbang dri za lto 'phye che rnams
190a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi//rol mo sna tshogs sgra yod de dag pas//yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa//thams cad rab tu dga' ba rgya chen byed//'jam gling
190a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di na tha dad phyogs rnamasu//kun nas sgra skad mtha' yas gyur mod kyi//de yi skad kyi rnam par bsgrags gyur na//de thos mi rnams thar po rje su thob//sa bla'i/
190a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang de bzhin par snang lha//de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba//de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'jug/rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o//dad pa khrung khrung ka la
190a4(dkon brtsegs): bing ka dang //rmi bya ne tse khu byug shing shang te'u//ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun//ji lta'i skad kyis nges ni tshim par byed//stag dang seng ge de bzhin
190a5(dkon brtsegs): dom dang spre'u//gzigs dang byi la ri dgas gleng chen bas//rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun//ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed//gang dag
190a6(dkon brtsegs): rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang //rkang mangs dang ni de bzhin rkang med rnams//bskul dang chad pas bcad dang phan gdags phyir//kun la do yi sgra skad shwe pa 'jug
190a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na//rab bam 'bring ngam ngon te tha ma'am//dmyal ba dud 'gro'i gshin rje'i 'jig rten na//lha mi rnams dang de
190b1(dkon brtsegs): niskad kyang 'thun//ji ltar rigs par byed pa ston kyang ni//mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med//mtshan ma med rnying 'dzin med 'tshong ba med//mnyam par gzhan//
190b2(dkon brtsegs): pas sems ni 'khrug pa med//dge pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na yang //de la 'bad dang sems 'dzin med par ni//bye ba'i zhing dang de yi gong du yang //gang
190b3(dkon brtsegs): gA'i bye snyed dbyangs kyis go bar byed//stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci yod pa//de dag de yi 'jigs chen sgra thos nas//chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la
190b4(dkon brtsegs): gor du//thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed//sems can gang dag rab tu smra 'dod dang //nga rgyal zil gnon su la'ang mi 'dud pa//de dag de yi gsal
190b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig thos nas//thal mo sbyar te gus por 'dud par byed//'on pa glen pa dge dang lce med dang //dig pa rnams dang gang drag skad mdzer ba//de dag de
190b6(dkon brtsegs): yis legs smras snyan thos dang //sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin par byed//nyon mongs gdungs shing nyon mongs gzir ba dang //nyes pa'i 'gyod pa brgya yis dkris pa
190b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams//de dag de yis dge tshig dag/thos nas//'gyod pa brtul bar gyur cing bsil bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun smra//mi rtag sgra thos
191a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni sems can rnams//sbyin dang thos dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang //brtson 'grus byasam gtan blo gros rtsom par byed//sangs
191a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dbyangs dang bar med gang gnas pa//mtha' yu dbyangs ldan mtha' yas ye shes can//de dag rnams kyi yon tan thams cad ni//bskal pa bye mang brjod
191a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang zad mi nus//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ngag chags pa 'am//sdang ba 'am//rmongs pa 'am/nyon mongs pa 'am//thogs pa 'am/nye bar
191a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa 'am/dman pa 'am//rab tu dman pa'am/brlang ba 'am/zher 'debs pa 'am/mi rdzogs pa 'am//rtsub pa 'am/rjesu chags pa'am
191a5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba 'am/byung rgyal 'am/bag la nyal ba 'am/'gal bar 'gyur ba'i tshig gam//nyon mongs pa sna tshogs bag la nyal ba 'am/mi brtan pa 'am/
191a6(dkon brtsegs): gtsam pa 'am/khongs pa 'am/'gyang ba 'am/myur ba 'am/dus ma yin par smra ba 'am/'dod pa dang ldan pa 'am/sdug pa la mngon par dga' bar
191a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'am/mngon par che ba 'am/shin tu chag sa pa 'am/rab tu lhod pa 'am/rab tu spangs pa 'am/rab tu dal ba'am/dbang po nyams pa'am/
191b1(dkon brtsegs): gdangs nyams pa'am/sems nyams pa 'am/yo ba 'am/dman pa 'am/mi gsal ba 'am/skad sub sub po 'am/ngor byas te smra ba 'am/'gal
191b2(dkon brtsegs): bar smra ba 'am/glags pa'am//'byung ba ma yin pa 'am/gshe bar byed pa 'am/gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/bdag dring pha rol gdung bar byed
191b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/tshig blang bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/tshig bzung bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/tshig dang ba ma yin pa 'am/rigs pa'i tshig ma yin pa 'am//'byo
191b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig ma yin pa 'am/mi dge ba'i tshig gam/yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gam/gzhogs 'drid zer ba 'am/chos dang mi ldan pa 'am/'gal ba'am
191b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa 'am/dus las yol ba 'am/tshod las 'du' ba 'am/lung bstan pa la thogs pa 'am/tshul 'chos pa 'am/kha gsug dang ldan pa'am/rnyed pas
191b6(dkon brtsegs): rnye par 'dod pa'i tshi ga gam/'byung ba'i ma yin pa'i ston pa 'am/mig 'khrul par 'gyur ba 'am/rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/som nyi'i tshig gne/sdug par byed
191b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gam/mi sdug cing gnad du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/khyad du gsod pa'i tshig gem/rang gi phyogs bsten pa'i tshig gam/gzhan gyi phyogs tsher gtsad
192a1(dkon brtsegs): mang bamamam sa sa mthamasama.a mthatha thasamathas mthamam mamama' tham mthamam mamama.am ma ma
192a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gam/bdag bstod pa lA rje su chags pa'i tshig gam/gzhan gyi bstod pa la bar du gcod pa'i tshig smra ba 'am/thing slad dam/
192a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhogs 'drid kyi tshig gam/gzhan la rab tu rlom pa'i tshig gam/bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gum/gsang rtol ba'i tshig glam/ngag bsrungs pa ma/
192a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i tshig gam/mkhas pas smad pa'i tshig gram/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gam/brlang 'debs pa'i tshig gama?/ngor mngon pu
192a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa'i tshig gam/gzhan gyis nyes pa dus ma yin par gleng ba'i tshig gam/zug rngus gnad du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/gzhan gyi nye pa kun brjod pa'i
192a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed pa'i tshig gam/mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis brda sprod pa'i tshig gam/las dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam//rje su
192a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa ma yin pa'i tshig mi 'byin to//zhi ba'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni sgra'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi skyobs dang /bsod nams
192a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu grub pas bden pa'i rje su 'breng ba dang ldan pa yin te/de gang smra ba de de lta bu nyid yin no//gal te do shing drung na 'dug gam 'chag/
192b1(dkon brtsegs): gam/'dug gam/nyal kyang rung /la lo zhig 'ongs nas klu skyes su shring ljon pa 'od la 'dab ma ji snyed cig yod ces zer na/de shing ljon pa de la yang mi blta 'dab mA la
192b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bgrang bar shing ljon pa de las 'dab mya ji snyed yod pa bzhin du mi nyung mo mang bar 'di snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ngo //yang gang gA'i klung
192b3(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma'i 'bru de brgya phrag ji snyed cig yod/stong phrag ji snyed cig yod/'bum phrag ji snyed cig yod//bye ba phrag ji snyed cig yod/ther 'bum phrag ji snyed cig
192b4(dkon brtsegs): yod/khrag khrig phrag ji snyed cig yod/bkrigs phrag ji snyed cig yod /gtam phrag ji snyed cig yod/khyad phyi ni ji snyed cig yod/mi 'khrugs pa ji snyed cig yod/dpag
192b5(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa ji snyed cig yod/grangs med pa ji snyed cig yod/gtan pa ji snyed cig yod/phyin byed phrag ji snyed cig yod/stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/glang po che'i
192b6(dkon brtsegs): spobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/bgrang ba phrag ji snyed cig yod ces 'di na/de bye ma de dag la'ang mi blta mi bgrang bar bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa bzhin du de snyed cig go/
192b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngage 'byung ste/bye ma da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis 'di snyed yod do zhes mkhyen pa yin no//zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin/
193a1(dkon brtsegs): gshog pa nyid mngon sum du gyur pa ma gtogs pa lha 'am/klu 'am/glanod sbyin namA/dI T+Ta'am/nA mu phyin nam/rlung lha'am/nam/
193a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding ngam/mi ma tsi 'am/lto 'phye chen po 'am/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum ni ma yin//zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar
193a3(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya ste/zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba ngas pa'i dus na drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/de'i dus na bram ze sngo sangs shes bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo //yang de'i
193a4(dkon brtsegs): dus na shing n+ya gr-i di'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba yal ga dang /'dab mu ming pos yog pa/khro ra 'khor yug tu chod kyang grags gcig yod pa zhig byung ste/der drang srong
193a5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba de gnas so//de na gnas pa'i tshe des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po bzang po de'i yal ge grang su yod pa lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun
193a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bar du bgrangs te/rtogs par byas shes par byaso//de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze sngo sangs shes bya ba grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir
193a7(dkon brtsegs): shing n+ya gro de'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/des zas kyi bya ba byas te/drang srong snang po zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas mngon sum du yang dag /
193b1(dkon brtsegs): mang mamam nganatsham sa sa mthasamasa.a mthathasamaShas mthamamamamatham amaka/mam
193b2(dkon brtsegs): par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam mang po byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas drang srong snang ba zhes bya bas bram ze sngo
193b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs shes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kye bram ze mo'i 'jig rten sems can gyi ris na gang shing n+ya gro de'i rgyal po 'dra'i 'dab mi'i grangs su yod par rtsi ba 'am/rtogs
193b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa 'am/shes par byed nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yod dam/smras pa/btsun pa mchis so//drang srong gis smras pa/bram ze de gang yin/bram zes smras
193b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/btsun pa bdag gis bgrang bar bgyi'o//drang srong gis smras pa/kye bram ze de'i phyir bgrongs shig/de nas bram ze sngo sangs de shing ljon pa de la yang mi lta/'drab ma rnams
193b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang mi bgrang bar skad cig le 'dab ma rtog pa la zhugs nas de 'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so//mi 'khrugs drug cu pang stengs phrag/bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag
193b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu gsum dreg dang bkrigs pa phrag/dgu bcu rtsa drug khrag khrig phrag/sum cu rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag/sum cu dang ni ther 'brum phrag/brgyad steng dang yong bye ba phrag
193b8(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab 'di mchis//bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal//de skad thos nas sngo sangs la//snang bas smras pa bram ze'i mchog/khyod ni bden pa'i tshig smra ba/
194a1(dkon brtsegs): legs so logaso 'dir bdon no//l-i nr-i khyud khor bcu gnyis dang //nyi ma bdun du mngon shes kyis//'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs/
194a2(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen//khyod ni gzugs pa mi mdzad cing //bgrang ba mi mdzad skad cig dri//'dab ma rtogs pa'i rje su zhugs//mkhyen 'di nyid kyi
194a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am lha yis bstan//bram ze bdag la don 'di gsungs//sngo sangs kyis smras pa/kye btsun pa gson cig/'di ni lha yis smras min mi yi ste//bdag tshig bdun
194a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug/nam mkha' zad pa grum par 'gyur srid kyi//kho bo brdzun du smra ba mi srid do//snang bar gyur pa bdag nyid chen po shwa ri'i bu//bram ze
194a5(dkon brtsegs): sngo sangs gyur pa shAkya seng ge ste//yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi ngag 'di 'dra//bde la gnas shing don dang chos dang ldan pa yin//zhi ba'i blo gros dri ltar
194a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag yongs su dag pa yin te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang /ngag yongasu dge ba la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bsna
194a7(dkon brtsegs): por 'od kyi/de bas gong du brtan na/byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pa tshad zin pa'i /mthar phyin par mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi
194b1(dkon brtsegs): gsang bya'i lo'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o////gzhan yang gsang ba pA'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so//
194b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang /sems kyi las yong su dag pa gang zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes/
194b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams mi byed do//mngon par shes pa las kyang ma nyams la ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams kyang bye'o//
194b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pas kyang rnam par tse na la bya ba thams cad kyang ston to//mngon par shes pa la yang gnas la/'jug pa chen po la yang gon so//de dag gi mngon
194b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de dag ni ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o//de dag gis mngon par shes pa de ni zad pa'i rnam pa ste/chos thams cad
194b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du mthong ba'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa ste/thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang ba'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs thaMd
194b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir/gzugs thams cad mthong ba'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir /thams
195a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su song ba'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la blta bu dang /sems kyi rang bzhin la so sbyor rtog cang
195a2(dkon brtsegs): blta ba'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni skal ba mtha' yas pa rjesu dran pa dang /mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu ma chad pa'o//de dag gi mngon par shes
195a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon du gyur cing /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni zag pa
195a4(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'i rjesu mthun pa dang /dus li blta zhing dus las mi yol ba'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa 'phags pa la mngon par chags pa'i
195a5(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o//de dag gis mngon
195a6(dkon brtsegs): byar shes pa de ni don zab cing bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par
195a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i mchog yin no//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang 'thun pa'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems
195b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o//de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba thob pa'o//zhi ba'o blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems/
195b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o//sems yong su dag pa de nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su bya ba dang /'od gsal ba dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /ra
195b3(dkon brtsegs): tu dul ba dang /legs par sbyangs pas bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang //snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par 'dzeg kyang /shin tu zad pa dang /
195b4(dkon brtsegs): mI skye ba nyid du ltung ba yang ma yin/bsam bzhin du yang 'dir skye la/'dod pa'i khams na 'khrugs pa yang med pa/bcings bzhin du skye ba yang ma yin/bcings
195b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du' 'pho bra yang ma yin/bcings bzhin du 'byung ba yang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las grol ba'o//kun
195b6(dkon brtsegs): nam nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o//phyin ci legs tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa las grol ba'o//des nas grol bzhin du spyi'o//grol bzhin du chi 'di'i/
195b7(dkon brtsegs): grol bzhin du 'byung ngo //de skye yang theg pa chen po las nyams pa mngam/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis kyang phun sum tshigs so//phyogs bcur sangs rgyas
196a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yongs su tshol yang mi rnyed mi dmigaso//de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang chos thams cad kyang sungs rgyas kyi chos rtog so//de ltar na
196a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /chos thams cad kyang chos ma yin la/chos ma yin pa yang ma yin par khas len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni kun du
196a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal no yang mri rnye //mi dmig so//chos gang yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsal na mi rnyed cing mi dmigus pa de la ni bgrang ba gang yang med/chos thams
196a4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa'o//gang chos thaMd mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos sam/chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa med do//mngon par
196a5(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pa ni chos rnams kyi don to//don la rlom sems su byed pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i gnod pa chen por 'gyuraro//gang la rlom sems med pa la ni don
196a6(dkon brtsegs): dang don ma yin pa de'i mdun na mi 'dug go/don du mi blta ba'i blo ni gang du yang thogs pa med do//de ni blo thogs pa med pa'o//gang blo thogs pa med pa de ni chags
196a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o//gang chags pa med pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'o//gang rgyun chad med pa de ni nyams pa med pa'o//gang nyams pa med pa de ni bcal ba don med pa

196b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//gang gi btsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ba de la skyon med do//gang la skyon med pa de la bdag gi ba med do//gang la bdag gri ba med pa de la yongasu 'dzin pa med
196b3(dkon brtsegs): do//gang la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la rtsod pa mdo//gang la rtsod pa med pa de la 'gyed pa med do//gang la 'gyed pa med pa de ni rtsod pa med pa ste/dge sbyong gi
196b4(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//gang dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa de na mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'o//gang na mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa de ni 'dod pa'i khamo su mi
196b5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so//gzugs kyi kham su mi gtog so//gzugs med pa'i khamasu mi gtogs so//gang thams cad du go tags pa ma yin pa de la ni kha dog med//rtags
196b6(dkon brtsegs): med/dbyibs med do//gang la kha dog med/rtags med dbyibs med pa de ni de 'dra ba nyid rjesu rtogs so//de ci 'dra ba rjesu rtogs pa de 'dra ba nyid rab tu rtog so//de'i phyir
196b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes rtogs pa dang rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/de la rje su rtogs par bya ba'am//rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rje su rtogs pa dang /rab tu
196b8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa zhes bya ste/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang byang chub sos dpal sems kyi gsang ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba ni gang
197a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa yang yin la bdag med pa nyid kyang yin te/snying rje snang yin la sems can med pa nyid kyang yin//dga' ba yang ldan la sgrog med pa nyid byung
197a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/btang snyoms kyang yin la gang zag med pa nyid kyang yin//sbyin pa yang yin la sems dul ba nyid kyang yin/tshul khrims kyang yin la sems zhi ba nyid kyang

197a4(dkon brtsegs): par sems pa nyid kyang yin/shes rab kyang yin la rgyu ba med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang yin la dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i
197a5(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid kyang yin//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yin la//yang dag par sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang yin lnga/spros pa

197a7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yang yin la rang 'byung gi sems nyid kyang yin/ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin//shes rab kyi dbang po yang yin la//
197b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/dbang po rnams kyang yin la chos thams cad lnga dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/stobs rnams kyang yin la mi rdzi blo'i sems nyid
197b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin/byang chub kyi yan lhag rnams kyang yin la blos rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/yam bsgom pa nyid kyang yin la bsgom pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin
197b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas kyang yin la sems nye bar zhi ba nyid kyang yin/lhag mA thong yang yin la rje su mi mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa yang yin la/
197b4(dkon brtsegs): shin du yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/sangs rgyas yid la byed pa yang yin la/yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/chos yid la byed pa yang yin la
197b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/dge 'dun yid la byed pa yang yin la mi gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/sems can yongasasu smin par yang byed la bzod/
197b6(dkon brtsegs): mya nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang yin la/chos kyi dbyings dang /dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
197b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yang yin la/sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang yin la/mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin//phyir mi ldog/
198a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa yang yin la ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/mtshan rab tu thob pa yang yin la/mtshan med pa'i sos nyid kyang yin//
198a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyun nyid kyang yin la/khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid kyang yin/bdud tshar gcod pa yang yin la/sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs
198a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i sems nyid kyang yin/byang chub kyang yin chos thams cad ni dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yin la/mi
198a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug mi ldog pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te/zhi ba'i blo gros
198a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang /sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o//sems dag pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems
198a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par rtogs te/sems can thams cad kyi sems la byang chub kyi sems de rje su zhugs pa yin no//byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi
198a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang snang bar gyur pa yin no//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/dper na na mkha' ni thams cad kyi rje su song ba dang /thams cad kyi rje su zhug pa yino//zhi ba'i blo gros de
198b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba dang /thams cad kyi rjesu zhugs bya yin no//gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus
198b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags lasastong phrag bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
198b3(dkon brtsegs): tu sems skyed//byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig
198b4(dkon brtsegs): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
198b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te//'jig rten gyis khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi chur
198b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bab bo//ma skyod par sil snyan drang rol mo'i sgra stong snying rab tu grags par gyur te/sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra de dag las kyang gang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
198b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang /thos nas kyang 'dzin cing mos par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang / glog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
199a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa'i semasna can de dag na rgyu snyoms la rmongs pa myed pa'i bsnam pa dang ldan te/dge pa mya nganung dang ldan pa ma yin+ti//de dang na
199a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rig par bya ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa'o//sems can de dag ni sems can
