206a1(dkon brtsegs): 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/khyod 'jig rten pa rol la 'jigs par byalta bar bya'o//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
206a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de khyod kyis yongs su bsngo ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/longs spyod mi zad pa dang /chos mi zad pa dang
206a3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa mi zad pa dang /ye shes mi zad pa ste bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyis lus yongs su dag pa dang /
206a4(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i tshogs kyis ngag yongs su dag pa dang /shes rab kyi tshogs kyis sems yongs su dag pa dang /ye shes kyi tshogs kyis shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/
206a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag go//gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sems can yongs su smin par byed pas thabs yongasu rdzob pa dang /bdud tshar gcod pas shes rab
206a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs rdzogs pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa dang /sangs rgyas mthong ba dang phrad pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
206a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung la chos kyi glatam des yang drug par bskrun/yang dag por 'dzin du bcug/yang dag
206b1(dkon brtsegs): pA r+ya gzengs bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas/tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/rab tu dga' nas dga' bo dang yod bye ba skyes te/ring drung med pA rI mu tig
206b2(dkon brtsegs): gi do zhal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so//yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de la phulo//ji srid 'i tshe
206b3(dkon brtsegs): bar du lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so//btsun mo'i 'khor de thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
206b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur to//lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos so//rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi gtam
206b5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te/gos dang rgyan tsa thogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par
206b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol bar gyur te/mngon par gsol nas kyang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rgyal
206b7(dkon brtsegs): po yul 'khor bsrung chos kyi rnyed pa phun sum tshogs pas rnyed pa chen po dang ldan nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor bcas te/bcom
207a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i zhabs dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la mgo bos byug 'tshal nus lan gsum bskor bu byas te/steng gi bar snang gi
207a2(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' las khang pa brtsegs pa de nyid nas rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can du slar 'khor nas/rang gi khyim du phyin to//zhi bo'i blo gros de nas rgyal bo yul/
207a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bsrung dus gzhan zhig na zla ba nye ba'i tshe me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshul gyi sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir song nas/de bskyed mos tshal chen po dan
207a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing /sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /rol mi'i sgra rab tu lon pa dang /rtse ba'i dam pas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do//chung ma dam par ma smad
207a5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba dang /dpe med ma zhes bya ba de gnyis rdzing dga' ba zhes bya bar khrus byas te/spos chus gos brlan nas seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug//
207a6(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis der 'dug pa'i pang pa nas/rgyal po gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gnyis skyil mo
207a7(dkon brtsegs): krung bcas par rdzus te byung ngo //khye'u de gnyis byung ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis kye ma khye'u 'di na chos sems
207b1(dkon brtsegs): //rlom rgyu dun rgyas zlo gas sogs sgra byung //zhob kyi sa do m+b+ha 'jug rten du khyo dug nas chos sems bya dang //rdzas kyi smrazlas nas byu 'aM m+bAr/
207b2(dkon brtsegs): de la khye'u chos sems pa ni btsun mo mi spyad pa'i byung ba nas byung /chos rgyu blo gros ni bAtsun+da mi dpe med mA'i bang ba nas b+h+yo//khye'u de gnyis byeng ma thag tu skyil myed krung
207b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams par gnyi gas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras//gang dag byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing //'jig rten mgo ni po yul du byung ba la//rab tu dong ba'i sems kyis
207b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal ba//de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed grogs po dag/gang zhig byang chub sems don mA brjed pa//de ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin//'khor ba'i 'khor lo
207b5(dkon brtsegs): los ni yid kyang log/sems can rgya chen rnams kyis legs par gsungs//steng gi phyogs na yan lag ma smad po//'dren mtshon ni dus dpog rgyal po ste//
207b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bdag cag chos don gnyer ba dang //'jig mgon yon tan 'byung gnas blta phyir mches//khye'u de gnyis spyil me krung bshig nas//de yi tshon ma
207b7(dkon brtsegs): yi bang nas babs//yul 'khor bsrung po ga lar de gnyis dadong //rting par phyag 'tshol thal mo sbyar te 'dug/yab cig bdag cig mche ba gsan du gsol/
208a1(dkon brtsegs): skal ba bye bar chos rnyed rag tu dka'//de rnyed nas ni byang chub mthong dra//mkhas pa dag ni gzhong yang mi gting ngong //sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyag tu//
208a2(dkon brtsegs): rab rnyed dkany+dza//phra mo dag ni chos la gnas pa dang //dal ba 'byor drang chos 'dod grobs po dang //'thun par gnas dang bstan la dang rab dkon//'dun dang brtso
208a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras de bzhin pag yod dang //rab tu byung thob rtag tu sheso bzhin can//phun pa'i ngo s+ya dang mnyen dang ma khengs dang //ngo rje khrel yang thos dang tshul khrims
208a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang //zhi rdul sgrog chags rnams la skyong rje byams//zab mo'i chos la chos kyi bzod ldan dang //brtson 'grus mthu dang sems ni mazhum dang //bsgrubs
208a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su sbyin byed dang //sems los rung zhing dben par gnas pa dang //lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta dang //mgo dang gos la 'bar ltar
208a6(dkon brtsegs): chos sems pa//de dag sangs rgyus yon tan de 'dra thob//bdag cag chos mchog gang dag rab brjid pa//chos mchog de dag yab cig rang rnyed dka'o//
208a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams de dag don du bdag cag lcags//de ni rgyal po'i drung du bzhud par brgya/dkar po'i chos rnams kyis ni yongs zin cing //sa cig zhe sarnam
208b1(dkon brtsegs): shos rtswa thod pa//rjes su dran pa 'askor ba na ye shes can//byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de gnyis dang //rgyul bye bu dang byaHsa shing byung med ban+d+has//byang chub
208b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mngon shes thob mkhas gnyis//ston pa yon tan rgyu la mchog ga la bar//na mkhyu' ldan der yang mngon du dong //de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhob la
208b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te//thams cad 'dus nas gus dang bcas par gan sngo//de nas rgyal sras chos kyi blo gros smra smra//byang chub lam de bdag cag bshad du grasal//
208b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas de dag rnams kyi bsam mkhyen nas//zab mo'i chos kyi gad ni rab gsong bya//chos rnams 'di dgra rten nas byung ba ste//bdag po med cing byed pa po
208b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral//na de yang sbyong zhing phyi rolo rgyu ba med//chos rnams 'di dag srog dang gos pa yin te//lha dang bya ba dag cing g.yo ba med//na mkha' lta bur rtag tu gzung du med//
208b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas chos gtom rnam dag pa//rna mab mang po de dag tams la bshad//byaM bye phrog gsum khrag khrig bdun the cu drug/mo skye bzang pa rje su thib par
208b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis zhag bdun gyi bar du mchod pa byas nas/kun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/gnyen
209a1(dkon brtsegs): /la dang btsun d+ha/ ga pang klo sa ts+tsha m+bu la rlung gi rlom du ma na m+b+hanapan gros dranas rgya su m+b+ha 'khor bsgyu na/na du/
209a2(dkon brtsegs): dben par song ste/bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug nas nang du yang dag bzhog cing 'di snyam du sems
209a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag na/gzhan nu 'di dag thams cad kyi nang na
209a4(dkon brtsegs): gang thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag gis brtag go snyam mo//de nas rgyal po yul 'kho
209a5(dkon brtsegs): srung gis de'i mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa byed du badrug ste/byi dor legs par byas shing legs par zin par bya ba nas gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyi
209a6(dkon brtsegs): ming bris te/bum pa de'i nang ni bcug nas rin+d+ra po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa byas nas/pad+ma do'i steng du bum pa de bzhag ste/zhag
209a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun du lha'i mchod pa me tog thams cad dang /spos thams cad dang /phye ma thams cad dang /bdug pa thams cad dang /byug pa thams cad dang /ngo
209b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzun nas na rgyu rgyu b+hU na na nga smon smra hA/ du sa
210a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus nu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam byar rgyal ba'i sa zhes bya bar gyur to//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/btsam//
210a2(dkon brtsegs): dran 'das 'od srung de de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po no ba zhes bya bar gyur to//de'i 'og tu rgyal po gzhon nu don thams cod grub pa zhes bya ba de'i mad
210a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo //de ni de yin te de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyul bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gyur to//de'i 'og tu rgyus bu gzhon nu ska rags can zhes bya
210a4(dkon brtsegs): be'i med byung bar gyur te/de ni byams pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuraro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu mchog blo gros shes bya ba de'i ming byung ste
210a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni seng ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal po gzhon nu glog gi lha zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/de ni rtog ces bya bo'i de bzhin gshegs
210a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bzang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni me tog dam pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//
210a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni me tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam
210b1(dkon brtsegs): par snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni skar ma rgyal zhes bya ba'i de nan gshegs par 'gyur//de'i 'og tu rtul bru gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces byA b+hi s+thi d+d+hang+ku stu/
210b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni sprin legs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyul bu gzhon nu rdul med ces bya dro'i mid byung ste//de ni lag bzongs sa
210b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs por 'gyur /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros rtul po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste//don 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//
210b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dge bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal
210b5(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu phyogs 'byor pa zhes bya ba ming byung ste/de ni mngon 'phags gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu
210b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu rnam par dag par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste//d+hI ni yon tan gyi mchog mnga' zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal
210b7(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu dpal sgren shes bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni nor dpal shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu lus shin tu
211a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i mo 'byung ste/de ni ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshog par 'gyuraro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu drag shul
211a2(dkon brtsegs): can zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni rin po che 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshogs par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rin chen grags pa zhes
211a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ming byung ste/de ni kun du snang zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rgyu cher bya ste/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar bu spyong yid pa de'i
211a4(dkon brtsegs): nang nas gcig bzhag ste/rgyal bu gzhon nu cod pan brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi bar du byung ngo //de ni yon tan mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba'i dri bzhin gshegs
211a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro//zhi bi'i blo gros de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung blo mthe'i yas shes bya ba de'i mang byung bar gyur pa dang snag gi gnyen mtshams
211a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang spun rnams na re gang gi tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byas pa de'i 'og
211a7(dkon brtsegs): tu khyod kyis ci zhig bya re yod ces dpyas pa dang /blo mtha' yas kyis smras pa/sangs rgyas chos rnams 'di dag na mkha'o mtshungs shing 'dra/bdag gi yid/
211b1(dkon brtsegs): mas can zad pa mang snyam pacing /rdul khrims kyis na bdag gi smon lam 'di dag gyur//dadag gi smon lam nA d+ha thams cad 'dir gsun cig/khyod na nang/
211b2(dkon brtsegs): ma pa dag sems pa dang //tshogs kyi rgyal po ji snyed de dag kun mas pa//rnams na du snyoms pad+mo rnyed bdag gi nur b+hur te//bdag dge sbyong tshogs kyang
211b3(dkon brtsegs): de kun ma lus snyed//de yis tshigasu bcad pa de ni smras ma thAg/de yi tshe na legs shes lha yi sa sgra phyung ste/sems can dag po khyod kyi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/khyod
211b4(dkon brtsegs): kyisde ji ltar bsams bzhin sems can don mdzod cig/ni de'i blo gros de ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung du gyur pa blo mtha' yas shes bya ba de ni skal pa bzang po
211b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma pa mos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/zhi ba'i blo gros skal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa dang /
211b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i tshe'i chad kyang de srid du 'gyur/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snye 'gyur ro//bdag de ltar pos
211b7(dkon brtsegs): pa na de'i phyir mos po zhes bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong du gcig gis mching ba dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji snyed mdzad pa de snyed de bzhin gshegs
212a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mos pas byed par 'gyur bas//thabs mkhas pa'i tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa'i khyad par la ltos/zhi/
212a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo glogros de nas gzhon nu stong po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu chos sems pa dang /chos kyi blo glos de gnyis la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu khyed
212a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab/chos sems pas smras pa/grogs po dag bdag ni khyed thams cad kyi lag na rdo rjer gyur te/nang ni spyod cing de bzhin gshegs
212a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsang ba thams cad las phyi rol du ma gyur la phyi nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang /mos pa dang /rtogs pa de ltar bdag smon lam 'debs so//chos
212a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/snag gi gnyen mtshams dag bgres bdag ni khyed rnams thams cad kyis byang chub thob pa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ste/bdag gis
212a6(dkon brtsegs): bskul byas khyed thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur cig ces smon lum 'di ltar 'debs so//zhi ba'i blo gros bde gnyis kyang smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin
212a7(dkon brtsegs): du/bcom ldan 'das des lung bstan par gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur pa de khyod kyis
212b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yin par de ltar mya blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur to//
212b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i bu gzhan nu stong yod pa de dag ni skal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag ste/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'dijig nas bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa zhes
212b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i bar dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nur gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros btsun mo ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i pang pa nA brdzus te byung ba'i khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni
212b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gris btsun mo dpe med ma zhes bya ba'i bang pa nas brdzus
212b5(dkon brtsegs): te byung ba'i khye'u chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba de ni tshangs pa gtsug pud can 'di yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos kyi blo gros shes bya bar gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po
212b6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor 'dir 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no//rgyal bu gzhon nu de rnams kyis sems can
212b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la//
213a1(dkon brtsegs): /mthar gyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro//zhi ba'i blogs 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de dag gis bsam pa thams cad 'byor pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu las byung
213a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems bskyed pa chud mi za brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mi 'gal ba la ltos/yul 'khor srung gis sngon gyi tshul gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//zhi po'i rma
213a3(dkon brtsegs): gros de lta bson byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems
213a4(dkon brtsegs): can chen po de dag ga rje su bslab par bya'o//tshig lhur blang bar mi bya'i//byang chub kyi lam la mngon par brtson pas bsgrub pa snying por bya'o//de la byang chub kyi lam
213a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/'di lta ste byams pa'i rje su 'brang ba'i sems bskyed pas/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang /bsdu ba'i
213a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po'i rjesu 'brang po dang /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgrub pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang /mngon par shes pa yongasu sbyang ba yongs
213a7(dkon brtsegs): skod pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs sogs pa ste/'di ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros
213b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam ni 'di lta ste/dad pa dang /bsdam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /drang ba nyid dang /g.yo med pa nyid dang /yungs pa nyid dang /sgrib pa
213b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid dang /mnyam pa nyid dang /sems snyoms pa nyid dang /mi 'jigs pa nyid dang /sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa nyid yin no//lam de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'byor
213b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//lam de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bde bar 'gro'o//lam de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gnod pa med pa'o//lam de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
213b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun chad med pa'o//lam de ni bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pas mi 'khrugs pa'o//lam de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par rtogs pa'o//lam de ni byamos pa chen
213b5(dkon brtsegs): pos 'byung ba shes pa'i rjesu song ba'o//lam de ni snying rje chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'o//lam de ni dga' ba chen pos mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o//lam de ni btang snyoms
213b6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos snying rje chen po'i rjesu song ba'o//lam de ni 'dod pa la 'dod tshogs dang /gnod sems dang /'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas sdong dum dang /tsher ma med pa'o//
213b7(dkon brtsegs): lam de ni zhe 'gres pa'i sems med pas bde bar 'gro ba'o//lam de ni gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /bral bas g.yo can dang bral ba'o//lam da ni phung po/
214a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /khams dang skye mched la legs par btags pas phyir rgol ba dang bral ba'o//lam de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas bdud dang
214a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o//lam de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang bral bas sems rlabs po cher 'gro ba'o//lam de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
214a3(dkon brtsegs): po dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhus pa'o//lam de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che dang 'thun pa'i rin po che chen po bsgrub
214a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//lum de ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas rtag tu gsal ba'o//lam de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par yong su zin pas dge ba ston pa'o//
214a5(dkon brtsegs): lam de ni rje su chags pa dang /khong khro ba med pas mthon dman med pa'o//lam de ni gnod sems dang tha ba dang /khro ba myed pas rdul dang bral ba'o//lam de ni mi da
214a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror 'gro ba'o//lam de ni mya dran las 'das pa'i mthar 'gro bas bde ba'i phyogasu 'gro ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na gang la nyan
214a7(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gri ba med pa dang /lam ma yin pa de 'dra ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' la mo ste/lam de la gnas ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na
214b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' mams yamamatshams sa thamasamama.a mthan thasamamathas mamamama.amasamamama' thamams ma ma mas yal la \u0f7fla/mams ma tham sas ma ya
214b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//byang chub kyi lam gyi le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo
214b3(dkon brtsegs): gros kyis gsung ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ci 'dra/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyir/
214b4(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig lnga khyod spobs par gyis shig/de skad ces smras pa dang /gsang dra ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/byang chub sems dpa' zhu bo'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so//
214b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bsten gyis rigs kyi bu nyon cig/zhi ba'i blo gros gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'o//
214b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste sku'o gsang ba dang /gsung gi gsang ba dang /thugs kyi gsang ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang zhe na/
214b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi dgongs shing rab tu mi rtog par spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu sbyin te/rigs kyi bu de la lha dang mi khe cig 'dug pa gtso bar
214b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong ngo //lha dang mi kho cag 'chag pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag par mthong ngo //
215a1(dkon brtsegs): /lha dang mi kha cig 'grong bra gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'greng bar mthong ngo //lha dang mi kha cig nyal ba gtso bor byed pa de
215a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mnal b.ri mthong ngo //lho dang mi kha tsAg chos ston pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mthong ngo //

215a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bris pra gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mthong ngo //lha drang mI kha cig langs pa gtso bar byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhengs par mtho
215a5(dkon brtsegs): ngongo//lha dang mi kha cig mig mi 'dzums par blta ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa mthong ngo //lha dang mi kha cig/
215a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa byed pa gtso bor 'dzin pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad par mthong ngo //lha dang mi kha cig mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu gauts+tsha bor byed pa de
215a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mthong ngo //de bzhin du la las ni dngul gyi mdog tu mthong ngo //de bzhin du shal gyi mdog dang /
215b1(dkon brtsegs): bai DUr+g+ha'i mdog dang /rdo'i snying po'i mdog dang /spug gi mdog dang /mu tig dmar po'i mdog dang /mu tig dkar ba'i mdog dang /mdog dmar po dang /mdog/
215b2(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang /brtsod ka'i mdog dang /mdog sngon po dang /mdog ser po dang /zla ba'i mdog dang /nyi ma'i mdog dang /me'i mdog dang /'od kyi mdog
215b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /brgya byin gyi mdog dang /tshangs pa'i mdag dang /ba mo'i mdog dang /ldong ros kyi mdog dang /mtshal gyi mdog tu mthong ngo //la las ni chu'i mdog dang /
215b4(dkon brtsegs): la las ni mya ngon 'tshang gi me tog gi mdog dang /tsam pa ka'i mdog dang /sna me'i me tog gi mdog dang /bar shi kwa'i mdog dang pad+ma'i mdog dang

215b6(dkon brtsegs): ser pa'i mdog dang /dpal gyi snying pa'i mdog dang /rin po che byi ru'i mdog dang /nor bu rin po che'i mdog dang /an dra rnyil gyi mdog dang /nam mkha' dag pa giH
215b7(dkon brtsegs): brjid kyi mdog dang /lha dang mi kha cig yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas par mos pa de dag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan gyi sngags pa mtha' yas pa

216a2(dkon brtsegs): ji rnyed yod pa dang /gleng yang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mi'o lus thob par gyur la/de'i nang nas sems can gcig
216a3(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can de dag ji snyed pa snyed la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /mdog dang /rtags dang /dbyibs dang /spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon
216a4(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub la/sems can gcig gis ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad re res kyang de skad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /mdog dang /rtags

216a6(dkon brtsegs): te/zhu ba'i blo gros rnam grangs des na/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi mos pa tshim par mdzad/ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sems can

216b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzad pa ni ma yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis lhun gyis grub byas/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshom par//

216b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi dgongs mi rtog par lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa tshim par mdzad///

216b6(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/las las byung ba ma yin/nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/pha me las byung ba mi yin/'byung ba chen po'i nur nur

217a1(dkon brtsegs): /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/chos kyi sku dang /gzugs dang /mtshan mong po'i sku dang /spros pa med cing rgyu ba med par
217a2(dkon brtsegs): sku yin yang de gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can+d+ra sgra bstan pas 'dul ba rnam sa kyi mig la snang bar 'gyuraro//gzugs las dben pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid

217a4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong /kha cig gis ni mi mthong /kha cig ni rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mthong /kha cig na nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong /kha cig

218a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/na mkha' ni spros pa med pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros dri bzhin gshogs pa'i sku
218a2(dkon brtsegs): yang spros pa mi mnga'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na na mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o//zhi ba'i bro gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang
218a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do//zhi ba'i ba'i blo gros de bzhin du
218a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni gzugasu snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o//

218b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ste/zhi ba'i blo gros gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar nus pa de ni kho bos
218b4(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten

218b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bskor nas grong khyer wA rA na si na drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na/shar phyogs logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam bya ka'i mdog gi
218b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang zhes bya ba de/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /mchod pa dang bsnyen
219a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod 'dir 'ongs te/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasal mgo bos phyug 'tshal nas lan gsum bsgyur/
219a2(dkon brtsegs): byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi skyon sngar 'dug go/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan

219a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs po'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par

219a7(dkon brtsegs): steng gi phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das te/'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal gyi
219b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol bzhes te/chos kyang ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang phyin nas de 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas
219b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shr-id de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad ngom mtha' yang ma dmigaso//de nas byang chub seMs//

219b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan bdun bskor ba byis nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
219b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag thag ji srid cig nas mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang gi'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa nas

219b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo me thogs la/sgyu'i tshad dam mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thogs lag so//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal
220a1(dkon brtsegs): dzabya/rigs kyi bu ga lA te shugs 'di nyid dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di nyid kyis gung ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal par stong gi phyogs log su
220a2(dkon brtsegs): song du zin kyang /bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus//rigs kyi bu gang yong dbye bzhag pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dper bya ba
220a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gzugs dang /mtshan
220a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi dper bya ba'i dper 'grod pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'o//dpe gcig ni ma gtogs te/'di ltar dpen mkha'o//nam
220a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo//ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo//shes rab kyang de tsam mo//rnam par grol ba yang de tsam mo//
220a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de tsa mo//sku yang de tsam mo//gsung yang de tsam mo//thugs kyang de tsam mo//gzugs kyang de tsam mo//mtshan/
220a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de tsam mo//de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad med pa khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to//zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub
220b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur to//tshim zhing mgu la yid rlangs nus rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid
220b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /sangs
220b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te//
220b4(dkon brtsegs): des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas//bcom ldan 'das lA lan bdun bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas thal mo sbyar
220b5(dkon brtsegs): te/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra ba yi//sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig/pha rol du na me chi 'tshal ba//de na
220b6(dkon brtsegs): nyam thag 'gyur ba lags//sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du//gang ga'i bye ba phrag brgya yi//bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi//zhing rnamasu ni bde ga mchiso//de snyed zhing du
220b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis nas ni//pad+ma can gyi zhing du mchis//'on kyang khyod kyi dbu gtsug dang //sgo yi tshad kyang ma mthong lags//zhing de na ni 'dren bzhugs pa//mtshan ni dpal
221a1(dkon brtsegs): rnan //b+h+rUM snyidang po lags// mam+b+ha bdag go bas ma mkhyen nas/'ad dran ga/ gyul te//la las su smranas chos rnams la//dbadun /
221a2(dkon brtsegs): snyid byed byan//de dgas sa rgyas mi 'tshul te//de dag rnal pa snor du 'dus/di 'i cig sa da /nam latam su basbyin pa lags
221a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos dang 'thun//gdon 'ang de'i tshad ma mas//namakha' 'di ni ji tsam par//sangs rgyas kyi ni tshul khrims dang //ti du 'dzin dang rnam gro
221a4(dkon brtsegs): dang //rnam gros yi shes mdzod de nam//rnam lnga'i rgyud ni tsamag//ngas rgyas gags byu du ma ste/ rten mthun du 'ad /
221a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i khams deng mtshungs pa lags//na mkhas ji snyed khyab myur pa//sus kyang de skyed khyib pa lags//sku yis ji snyed khyur gyur ba//'od kyis kyang ni de
221a6(dkon brtsegs): lhag/'odadi kyis ni d+hid khyab myur hU~M//gasmang gis//dzin de skyeng/gsung gis ji snyed khyung chu /thugs kyis nA~M n+ti d+he skyed lha//thugs kyi
221a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyong khyung byung po//byams pa'i kyang na de snyed khyi//byams thos nga sgyud khyab myur rmi/mi gyis kyis ni skyed khyog/ye gas khyod khye gyu gri/
221b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni de snyed khyab//gang gis byang chub blo bskyed pa//de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid//byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //de la gal te gzugs mchis na/
221b2(dkon brtsegs): na mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste//de ni de bas ldog par 'gyur//sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi//phung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba//de snyed byang chub sems dpa' yi//
221b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems las rab tu byung //byang chub sems kyi bsod nams kyi//phung po ji snyed brjod pa bas//dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na//de bas bsod nams ches
221b4(dkon brtsegs): mang ngo //dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni//sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan //skal pa bye bar brjod byas kyang //mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags//
221b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang //byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de//stong pa nyid lo mos pa yi//bcu drug char yang mi ri lags//stong pa nyid la 'drir myos nas//
221b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang //dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin bgyid pa//'di ni bsod nams sdud pa lags//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po//chos kyi rtogs pa
221b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas//de yi byang chub spyad spyod cing //sangs rgyas yon tan 'thob par 'gyur//tshigasu bcad pa brjod pa na//zhing rnams byi bar rab tu g.yos//lha ni bye ba phrag
222a1(dkon brtsegs): stong gis//rlom mo'i sil snun b+h+yo ba blangs//sangs rgyas seMni b+ha ba ny-i/gas 'byung b+h+yonA~M 'o shAd /srog rgyu/smra b+h+yo ba phrag d+ha rdza
222a2(dkon brtsegs): dag/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po//rang byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas//gnas 'di bsgom rmyis mo khyab ste
222a3(dkon brtsegs): dpag yos bla na ma mchis lagaso//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o///bam po bzhi pa/zhi ba'i blo gros don sems can
222a4(dkon brtsegs): du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo //kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo //de la gang dag gis mthong ba de dag
222a5(dkon brtsegs): nidaga' ba skyes nas blta'o//gang dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cing mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi//
222a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas gsol ba mthong //zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub kyi rim gro bi'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs shes bya ba dag
222a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du 'brang zhing de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du zad na sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams
222b1(dkon brtsegs): rgod du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pas khamapa chad du blangs pa de blangs pa de yang snod de nyid na 'dug ste/da b+ha de dag gis khyer nas nga bzhin gshegs pas 'dul
222b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsub baspyad pa/lngas kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis skye klo nas de dang de dag tu 'phang mi ba/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /zas mi rnyed pa bkres pas nyams chung bar
222b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos kyi pham phabs dro byin nas sems can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang /bkras skom dang bral te/bde zhing lus tshim nas
222b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa theg pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//gang dag log par ltung ba'i gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nu gnas pa dang /byang
222b5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus pa de dag la yang de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o bar gyi rgyur 'gyuraro//zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis nA yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
222b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhal zas mi gsol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal zag can dud ltar reg par bya ste/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyon sred mod kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa sra ba
222b7(dkon brtsegs): snying po can mi shig ba rdo rje'i rang bzhon//zhi ba'i blo gras de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lo ni pho ba dang /yang ka med do//rnag gam khrag gam/'chil ma'amaHngar bsnabs sa
223a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan skyugs sam/myi gtsang ba med kyi/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyu na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gar bu lta bu ste/log stong ma yin/ba spu'i bu ga med pa
223a2(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar ci khyad rdo rje dang 'dra yang 'jam khyad ka tsa li nai di ka ltar reg ni bde bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku che ba nyid le ltos//ni
223a3(dkon brtsegs): bI blo gros gang gi tshe gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang lha'i bu mo rnam de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba ni/sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
223a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/de dag nyon mongs pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang /tshod de yod do//zhi ba'i blo gros sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis de bzhin
223a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so//zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dgo gas mthong na de dag byams
223a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thob po//gauti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dge ye shes kyi snang ba 'thob po//cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar shes
223a7(dkon brtsegs): so//ser sna can gang dag gos mthong na de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro//gnod
223b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gis mthong na de dag bzod pa 'thob po//le lo can gang dag gis mthong na de dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro//sems g.yeng ba gang dag gis mthong na//
223b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ting 'dzin 'thob po//shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu mdor na sems can dkar po'i chos gang dang gang dag dang
223b3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu/mi dge ba'i rnam par rtogs pa thams cad rgyun chad nas/dge ba'i sems
223b4(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o///
223b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrims pa mi mnga' ba dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/de bzhin gash+ye///
223b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di snyam drangs sprul pa dag sprul to//sprul lo//sprul par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/
223b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed bzhud de/zhi ba'i blo gros 'i
224a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang bya'o//zhi dwa'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzod pa'i don du sku lus 'od khwa dog dum pa kha//
224a2(dkon brtsegs): dog tha dad pa/kha dog brgya stong pa dag byung ste 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba byed pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrims pa mi mnga' ba dang /
224a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mdzad pa mnga' bas mdzad de/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku logaslong ba dang sku'i phrin las te/sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad
224a4(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig bstan du zad kyi skal pa 'am de bas lhag par brjod kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i mthar phyin par mi nuso//
224a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
224a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag
224a7(dkon brtsegs): po la ga na rdo rje la lha dang /me'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to//bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
224b1(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje de spyi bo la gzhag nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba bstan pa 'di logs par spras pa legs log so//de bzhin gshegs pas kyang snang /
224b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing rje suM dgyes so//zhes leg so zhes bya ba byi no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra'i gsang ba'i le'u sti bdun pa'o///gsung ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang
224b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso//zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang /gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag
224b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhi ni gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /gang gi nub mo len pa mi
224b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungaso//gsung bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros
224b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs byung ba'am/rngub pa mi mang //rnam par mi rtog/rnam par mi 'apyod do//dam par rtog
224b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa med na ngag mi 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang rnam par mo rtog/rnam par mi dpyod/rtog par mi mdzad/rnam par rtog par mi mdzang/mi gsung mi/
225a1(dkon brtsegs): /brjod gsung bar mi mdzad kyang sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems to//dro bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung ngo snyam//de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par gnan/
225a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig pa mi mdzad kyang sems can yi ge tur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin gshegs pa ni/
225a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag la chos ston to//bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo//de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyomasasu mdzad
225a4(dkon brtsegs): do//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang /sgros dang /zhal gyi rkan dang /ljags dang /zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la 'byung bar yang brag/de bzhin gash+ye
225a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba de ni nam mkha' las 'byung na/sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snya mo//zhi ba'i blo gros de
225a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste/rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang /'jam pa dang /yid du 'ong/
225a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /yid du 'thad pa dang /dag pa dang /dri ma med pa dang /'od gsol ba dang /sten cing 'jebs pa dang /gnyen par 'os pa dang /mi tshugs pa dang /snyan pa dang dul ba dang /ni TIg
225b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /mi brlang ba dang /rab tu dul ba dang /rnar snyan pa dang /lus som par byed pa dang /sems sim par byed pa dang /snying dga' bar byed pa dang /dga' bde bskyod pa dang /yongs su

225b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par rig par byed pa dang /rigs pa dang 'brel pa dang /zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang /seng+ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang /glang po che'i sgra skad dang /'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang /kr-i'i
225b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i sgra dang /dri za'i glu dbyangs dang /bya ka lA bing ka'i sgra dbyings dang /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang /shang shad te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang /lha'i dbang po'i dbyang
225b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar snyan pa dang /rnga'i sgra dang /mau khengs pa dang /mi dma' ba dang /sgra thams cad kyi rje su zhugs pa dang /tshig zur chag med pa dang /ma tshang ba med pa dang /ma zhum pa dang /mi zhan pa dang //
225b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba dang /khyab pa dang chub pa dang /rgyun chags pa dang 'brel ba dang /sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang /dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /ma smad pa dang /mi 'gyur
225b7(dkon brtsegs): pab dang /ma rtags pa dang /'khor kun du grag pa dang /'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang /zhe sdang 'dul ba dang /gti mug sel ba dang /bdud tshar gcod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
226a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan par 'byung ba ste/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'byung //zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de//
226a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang zhi ba'i
226a3(dkon brtsegs): blo glos de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam dung mdo'i sde 'am/dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde 'am/lung du bstan pa'i sde 'am/tshigasu bcad pa'i sde'am/che du brjod pa'i sde'am/gleng
226a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi'i sde'am/de lta bu byung ba'i sde 'am/skyes pa'i rab kyi sde'am/shin tu rgyas pa'i sde 'am/rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde 'am/gtan la phabres par bstan pa'i sde'aste/dpa'am/
226a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshul 'am/rtogs brjod pa'i sde 'amo/kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe 'am/rab te gsal bar mdzad do zhe'am/rab tu shes par mdzad zhe'am/rab tu 'jog go zhe'am/
226a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed do zhe'am/rnam par 'grel to zhe 'am/brjod do zhe 'am/yang dag par bsgrags par mdzod snyam du mi dgongaso//de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa
226a7(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor ram/dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/dag bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/dge bsnyen mi'i 'khor ram/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin
226b1(dkon brtsegs): /dong /namakha' lding dang /mr-i 'am ci dang /lho 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang rung ste/dor de dag go dbang po'i rim pa dang /de dag ci 'dra ba'o chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgongs par 'gyur ba/
226b2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i thos pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang chos bstan pa da ni phan tshun gyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod pa med par thams
226b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun tu shes te/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas
226b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshud med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsungs na/sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni/sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams gzud pa'i phyir
226b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bstan gyi/zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med de/sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de
226b6(dkon brtsegs): skal pa tsamu du bshad kyang de bas lhag par 'gyuraro//zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang /sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod
226b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de dag skal pa tsam du bstan kyang de dgo re re yang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro//zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshe tshad skal pa brgyad
227a1(dkon brtsegs): stong du bzhugs pas sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tsho mthar
227a2(dkon brtsegs): drug par 'gyur gyi/sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pu gang yang mdo//sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes snyoms can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa dri yang de
227a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to//zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa
227a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'byung ste/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i
227a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi rje su zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba ma shes kyi na mkha' las 'byung bar mi shesngo//zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams
227a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar sheso//snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de
227a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug gtor nas byung ba shes pa dang /spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang /dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa dang /phrag pa nas byung
227b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /dpral ba dang /smin mtshams dang /mdzod spu dang /spyan dang stan dang /shings dang 'gram pa dang /zhal dang mgul nas byung bar shes pa dang /de bzhin du dpung
227b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /phyag dang /song ma dang /rtsib logs dang /brang dang rmyi ba dang lto ba dang /gsang ba'i gan sa dang/brla dang /pus no'i lhang dang /byin pa dang //yong bu dang /zhabs kyi mthil dang /
227b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rnams dang /dpe byad bzang po rnams dang /spu'i khung bu thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems cano kha cig yod de/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de
227b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros mos pa ji lta ba dang /yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang /bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung ba
227b5(dkon brtsegs): shes kyang zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/btang snyoms pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/rol mo sil snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam
227b6(dkon brtsegs): du lags par sbyar ba byas pa/gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis skyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod de 'on kyang de la sgra 'byin par spro ba gang yang med mod kyi/yongs su/
227b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyang ba byas po'i khyod par gyis sgra snyan pa yang 'byung //zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i shes pas bskyod na 'byung ste/
228a1(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang dri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byin par spro ba yang mi mnga' maud kyi/sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
228a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rjesu 'jug par yang 'gyur ro//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/brag tsho'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed pa yang 'byung la/de'i rlung
228a3(dkon brtsegs): na yang ma yin/phyi rol na yang ma yin/gnyis ka myed pa lnga yang mi dmigs so//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam po rnam par rig
228a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed par 'byung la de'i nang na yang ma yin/phyi rol na yang ma yin la/gnyis ka med par yang mi demigs//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yid
228a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskong ba zhes bya ba yod de/de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/sems can gang gis bsam pa ji 'dra bar
228a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag pa'i bsams
228a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dge ba yang snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/sems can gang gis bsam pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
228b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar des shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rnam par rtogs pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//
228b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsung dbyangs tshad med pa ste/zhi ba'i blo gros gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam/mtha' bzung bar nus pa/
228b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni/kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
228b4(dkon brtsegs): rten na ma mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
228b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskor cing bzhugs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa la brten nas/dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher
228b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa de 'jug du phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig tu ring du 'gro
228b7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo//de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rang gi sten gyi steng nas mo snang bar
229a1(dkon brtsegs): /gyur te ri rab kyis mor phyin nas de de na 'dug na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra bar kho nar thos so//rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten rgya
229a2(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed kyi nub phyogs kyi rI rab las 'das shing gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das/khyor yug las kyang 'das te/'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi 'khor yug gi rlom la
229a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug na yang /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra bar kho nar thos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye ma mo'u
229a4(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dpog par 'dod kyis/ngas 'di dag la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstang ngo snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyi bsti nges pa dang /de sangs rgyas
229a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthu dang /rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khaMs
229a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar na bzhugs shing 'tsho la bzhes te/chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan mo'u dgal
229a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen pos phyin te/de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/'di lta ste daser na 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na 'dug pa'i mes cha cig
229b1(dkon brtsegs): shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du/gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sgra thos so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gash+ye
229b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo//byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i
229b3(dkon brtsegs): lhung bzed kyi rton ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mchag cing 'dug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas/bco ldan 'ang de la 'di skad ces gsol
229b4(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu la 'chog cing mchis pa 'di ga las mchis pa zhig/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
229b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'di la brnyes pa'i sems mi bskyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ste/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi/
229b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog go/nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di
229b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to//mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag khyad du gsod kyis/khyod kyis 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
230a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul rgyu tsho 'phrul ston cig/de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyu
230a2(dkon brtsegs): chen thos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan bdun bskor ba byas nA bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rin po chu'i gli
230a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bya'o//bka' stsal pa mo'i dgol gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shesan gyis shig/de nas gnas brten mo'u dgal gyi bus
230a4(dkon brtsegs): na mkhye'al shing ta lnga bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags /rin pa 'i grong de skyil mi dkrungs gcig gis khyab par byas//skyil mo dkrungs de las kyang r+m+ma
230a5(dkon brtsegs): tig gi rgyun phreng bye ba khrag khrig pa rgyu stong mngon par 'phyang //mu tig gi rgyun phreng gi 'bru thamos cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung //'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtsem
230a6(dkon brtsegs): dag las kyang pad+mo rnams byung ngo //pad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la yong bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs
230a7(dkon brtsegs): par snang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu drag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
230b1(dkon brtsegs): lA brtsams te/bsngags pa gsung ngo //dri nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
230b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o//de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar stong dang stong gnyis pa khyab par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
230b3(dkon brtsegs): skyil mo dkrung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig/de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgas
230b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de brdzus te/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnas brten mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'ang ci zhig gi slad du 'jog rten gyi khams 'dir mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag
230b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan mo'u dkal gyi bu
230b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams
231a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir phyin gyis khyod kyis lan gnyi shu de lta bu'i sems mi bskyed ci//gyul to mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi stos 'di nyid kyis/
231a2(dkon brtsegs): nung phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyi skal par sang yang khyod kyis 'di ltar bac+doMs shAkya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/sangs
231a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no//de nas gnas brten mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag
231a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/nyes pa bshags pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas/bdag gi
231a5(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa can de nongs pa 'chag so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid cig nas mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung dgu cu rtsa
231a6(dkon brtsegs): dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so//mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das badrag ni rang mo zhig nas mchis pas/lus dub
231a7(dkon brtsegs): ste 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod der mchi ba'i rngo mi thog go/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu bid+hi ji snyam du sems/khyod rang gi rgyu 'phrul
231b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i slad zhe na/khyod ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
231b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'drir phyin gyis/khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshol cig dang /de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro//mo'u dgal gyi bu gal te khyod rang gi
231b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khamos der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te/'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur
231b4(dkon brtsegs): ro//mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sha re ram/lho 'am/nub bam/byang ngam/phyogs gang zhig tu phyin/gsol pa/bdag phyogs slad/gang nus 'dir mchis pa ma
231b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgel gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dos kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/gal te khyod rong gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten
231b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams der 'gro ni ni/skal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/bka' stsal pa/mo'u
231b7(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gaushegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs legs na bzhugaso//de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe yan lag lnga sa la
232a1(dkon brtsegs): 6/gtugs te/shar phyogs log su phyag 'tshal nas//de'i tshe tshogasu bcad pa 'dri smras//mthu chen mang balha dang mi mchod pa//ye shos mtha' yas mtha' yas
232a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung ldan pa//rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongasu gsol//slar yang zhing 'dir rab tu mtsho bar bgyi//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus//bcom ldan 'das kyi
232a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyis bus gsol ba bteb pa'i sgra de thoso//thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun
232a4(dkon brtsegs): dgang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
232a5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo 'di ni mo'u dgal gyi bu ste/sangs rgyas kyisri zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu cu rtswa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/
232a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod
232a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/gsol ba 'deb pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo //kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po che'i skad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis/bka'
232b1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/kun dga' ngos mo'u dgal gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang /'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro//de thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
232b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang gnas brten mo'u//
232b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/'od zer
232b4(dkon brtsegs): des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye me snyed po de dag las thal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//de nas thams cad dang
232b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ze byi gyi rgyal po de dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /gnas brtan mo'u dag la
232b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal
232b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjesu 'brodra te shog cig/de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten to/
233a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rnam par rtog patsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasal
233a2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan bdun bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/phyag 'tshal nas nyes po bshags pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin pa bye
233a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal na/de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags so//bcom
233a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di na ji tsam pa de tsam legaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ji skad
233a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang yang med de/mo'u ngagal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad dam/mthi' yongasu tshol bar sems
233a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni na mkha'i tshad dam/mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nam mkha' ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas gas khyab po//gnas
233a7(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang /'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//zhi ba'i blo glos
233b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag/
233b2(dkon brtsegs): ci mang ba yin nam/zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdage po sems can gcig gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por
233b3(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgya su 'gyur ba rnams kyis skal par yang bsam pa 'am/gzhal ba'am/brtsi ba 'am/brtag par mi nus na/sems can thams cad kyi lta
233b4(dkon brtsegs): mos kyang ci dgos legs na rdo rjes smras pa/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod mos par bya'o//khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji/
233b5(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa 'di lta ste/sems can thams cang tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung gau yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste/de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa
233b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//stong gsum sems can gang yin pa//de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas//skal bar sems can gcig cig gi/
233b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so//sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa//sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang //nga yis yid 'di sheso zhes//de ni rtog par mi 'gyuraro//dus gsum sems
234a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi//sems pa dag ni ji snyed bya//'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe//dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed do//chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na//dbyangs
234a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag ji skad pa//chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi//chos ston pa yang de tsam mo//sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni//ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa//sems can
234a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig po'i spu gcig nas//'od zer 'byung ba de snyed do//'jig rten mgon po'i spu kun gyi//'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa//mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe//gsung gi yan lag de
234a4(dkon brtsegs): bas mang //dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyi//skal pa rab tu bstan mdzad kyang //sangs rgyas kyis ni gsung dbyangs kyi//mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//nyon mongs gzugs
234a5(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin rnams//gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod//gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni//nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed//ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med
234a6(dkon brtsegs): pa//thams cad du ni mi dmigs te//de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa//shin tu dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//ji ltar tshig ni yod min te//nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa/
234a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing //nang dang phyi rol mi gnas//ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung //gang yang rnyeng par mi 'gyur ba//de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs
234b1(dkon brtsegs): shing //de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin//sems can dag ni kun gyi tshog/rab 'bring tha ma grang yin pa//de dag lus dang sems mi gnas//gnas pa med pa'ang ma yin no//ji ltar sil
234b2(dkon brtsegs): snyan 'phrul 'khor byas//rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba//sgra 'byin byed pa grang yang med//'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung //de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir//sems can kun gyi//
234b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas bskyod//sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang //'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'//ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra//nad dang phyi rol mi gnas pa//de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung //
234b4(dkon brtsegs): narlung dang phyi rol mo gnaso//ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par//snang bas sems can tshim par byed//de ltar rgyal ba'i mi rtogs gsung //sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed//zhi ba'i blo
234b5(dkon brtsegs): brogros gzhon yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skrod kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros stong
234b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na skye ba'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnamasu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
234b7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par gzhog go/zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal ba dang /sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal
235a1(dkon brtsegs): /'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa des bla ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/za ba dang /za ba'i rtsa ba dang /za ba sel ba dang /zla ba 'gog byed

235a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/'khor ba dang /kun bsnyen dang /zad pa dang /zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o//'dir/

239b6(dkon brtsegs): byu //de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po ldeg na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag
239b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lege na rdo rjes mthong ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed //gang dag bstan pa
240a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas mos shing som nyi zla bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i ma nyid rnyed par 'gyur//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar/
