240a3(dkon brtsegs): byin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig
240a4(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstan to//bsnyad do///
240a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bshad//gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring po mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
240a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas mos pa dang /'chang ba dang /ma dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang /don rtogs pa'i rjesasu rtogs pa dang /de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa
240a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
240b1(dkon brtsegs): med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//me tog gi chur chen po yang phab po//sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra yang byung ngo //sems can
240b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed//byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rje su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' grangs
240b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' grang med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs
240b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byaso//de nas 'khor de'i khyams kyi dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shong tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa
240b5(dkon brtsegs): brtul te mngon du byung bar snang //de dag stang gi bar snang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di tha~Md
240b6(dkon brtsegs): spos chus chag chag btab par gyur te//de nas bcomi ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phag
240b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags te/'di su'i snga ltas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag
241a1(dkon brtsegs): sems med kyang 'di ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /de bzhin nyid du
241a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/de dag ni ma rig pa dang /lta bar 'gyur ba'i sgo glegs bcig nas chos kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang /
241a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par 'gyur te 'di ni chos kyi rnam
241a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
241a5(dkon brtsegs): ge sad pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso//zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs
241a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang /thugs kyi 'phrin las yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper nu/gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o lha'i ri su sems can gang dag
241a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis skal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa
241b1(dkon brtsegs): mangs ya mams ngan aHma tshams sa nathamasamasa.a mthan thasamam Shas mthamabamaTha tam can ma sa thamamam tham/thamama'atham bam pa ma.a/mtha tham mama' mam
241b2(dkon brtsegs): de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rjes mu 'brang ste/de nas sha 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skyeb so su na na gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa
241b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi gnas pa ste/gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /grong gi nub mo de bzhin gartse
241b4(dkon brtsegs): pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa mi mnga'o//thugs la rtogs
241b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mnga'/thugasA la rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga'o//thugs la 'gyur ba mi mnga'/thugs la tshad mi mnga'/thugs la 'khrul pa mi ma/thugs la sel ba mi mnga'
241b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs la g.yeng ba mi mnga'/thugs la khengs pa mi mnga'/thugs la dma' ba mi mang/thugs la kun du srung ba mi mnga'/thugs la rgyu ba mi mang ra/thugs la shin tu rings pa/
241b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'/thugs la rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/thugs la g.yo ba mi mnga'i//thugasA la nges par sems pa mi mnga'/thugs la dgyes pa mi
241b8(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'//thugs la rab tu rgyub ma mnga'/thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/thugs la rnam par rtogs pa mi mngar/thugs
242a1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rtog pa mi mnga'//thugs la zhi ba'i gnas mi mnga'/thugs la lhag mthong mi mnga'/thugs la rnam par shes pa'i rjesu 'brang ba mi mnga'/rang gi thugs
242a2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa mi mnga'/gzhan gyis sems la blta ba mi mnga'/thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/thugs rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang yid la gnas pa mi mnga'//thug
242a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/thugs sgra dang /dri dang ro dang reg lnga gnas pa mi mnga'/thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'i//thugs dmigs pa la gnas pa mi mnga'//thugs yod/
242a4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa mi mnga'/thugs nang na gnas pa mi mnga'/thugs phyi rol na gnas pa mi mnga'o//thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go/thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go/
242a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs de 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin ga bya ba ni de ltar thugs yongasu dag pa ste/thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon
242a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi sgrub la/chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs par 'jug/rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas sems can gang gi sems kyang yongasu ma dag
242a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi gzigs te/de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go//gzegs kyang spros par mi mdzad do//gzigs pas gzigs pa dang /rnam par gzi
242b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi gzigaso//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba
242b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin/chos kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/lha'i rna bas thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin/gzhan gyi
242b3(dkon brtsegs): sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin la de
242b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yang ma yin//de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi mnga' zhing
242b5(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub la mngon par 'du mdzad par mi mnga' bar granas so//sems can gyi skyid pa thams cad la gzigs so//sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam
242b6(dkon brtsegs): par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen te//de'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
242b7(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la/
243a1(dkon brtsegs): mngam mtshams sa mamasamasas mthan thasams ma ma yam
243a2(dkon brtsegs): /ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kya mi 'dor ro//sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la/de'i chos thams cad la chags pa myi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du sa mchag sa//
243a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi mnga'/yid kyang mi mnga'/rnam par shes
243a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mi mnga'/sku'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/gsung gi 'di byed kyang mi mnga'/thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi
243a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzod//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul po dang mtshungs pas mnyam mo//sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go//de la
243a6(dkon brtsegs): sku'i rtsom pa dang /gsung gi rtsom pa dang /thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la sangs rgyas kyi ma dzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa ma mnga'
243a7(dkon brtsegs): la/mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshun nyid du chos thams cad mngon
243a8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can la thugs brtsegs de bzhin du bstan to//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i phye
243b1(dkon brtsegs): shos ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin//'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/phung po la gnas pa ma yin//khams la gnas po mo yin//skye mchod la gnas pa ma yin//nang lagan/
243b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/phyi la gnas pa ma yin/dge ba lnga gnos pa ma yin/mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/'jig rten pa la gnas pa ma yin/'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/
243b3(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma the bo dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/kha nu ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin/zug pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/'das pa
243b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin//so sor brtag pa la gnas pa ma yin/saur brtan pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/zhi ba'i
243b5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa myi mnga'o//de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/sems can la thugs rtse bas sems can thams cad kyi sems
243b6(dkon brtsegs): dang spyod pa dang /bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba tshugs pa mi mnga' zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par
243b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la sems can thams cad la
244a1(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs pas gyis mi khyab pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang bya'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o////de nas
244a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas
244a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theng na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub semasde dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slad na yang gsang ba po'i bdag po mchis lags sam/btsom
244a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pA/shA ri'i bu bya ba 'di bas rmi gyi mi khyab kyis zhog shig/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par
244a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//de lta mod kyi shA ri'i bu gang dag dod cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gnas 'di la sgrog par mi 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
244a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsha du gsol/bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches par mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na/
244a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das da ltar sang+yas kyi mthus mthong lags te/'di sngonani bdag gis nam yang ma mthong ngo //bka' stsal pa//
244b1(dkon brtsegs): shU ri'i bu de bzhin du gasnang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub snyoms dpa' rnams kyi rgyab rgyab na yang gnas te//sngon gyi smon lam gyi skyobs dang /mdun
244b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag ni rdo rjes gzugasu sku bston to//shrI ri'i bu stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa nA/sems can ji snyed 'khod pa
244b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyu ba rgyub tu gusang ba da'i bdag po lig na rdo rjes/lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan kyang /des ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs ying sa rtogs
244b4(dkon brtsegs): par bstan par mi 'gyuraro//shA ri'i bu khyud kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na leg na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam//gsol pa//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nga gded mthong
244b5(dkon brtsegs): logs te/skyon ni ma mthong ngo //bka' stsal pa/'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na khyod kyis de ma mthong ba mi gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'am/brgya byin nam tshangs pa 'am/
244b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba glang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyub na lag na rdo rje/rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par
244b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /skal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang de
245a1(dkon brtsegs): /dag thams cad kyi rgyu ba na yang gsang ba pa'i dag pa lag na rdo rjegan suM por snang ste/byin gyis brnyan bdog/na ni gas drab pa'i bdag po'iyin no//hA/
245a2(dkon brtsegs): ring bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyab na yang 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang /mngon par shes pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs dang lda no//gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i
245a4(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po
245a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /bdud 'dul ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /bkod pa bstan pa la brtsams te/
245a6(dkon brtsegs): rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba dang /gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa khyod spobs par gyis shig/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems
245a7(dkon brtsegs): dpe'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med/de dag ni tshe'i tshod skal bar gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste/bstan par slob ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang cung zad
245b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig brjod par bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa na rnam pa gcig ma yin to/mu stogs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas spyad do//dka'
245b2(dkon brtsegs): thub dang /lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang /lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag ma/ngon par snyoms pa de bos chos khyad par du 'phags pa 'am/chos
245b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang /brtul zhugs dang dka' thub gang dag gis bya bas kun du bstun par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun du bstun te//
245b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de lo kha cig gis ni bya nga chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya gcigatsugs te 'dug par mthong /kha cig gis ni lag pa btegs te 'dug par mthong /kha cig gis ni
245b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma lta zhing 'dug par mthong /kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong /kha cig gis ni tsog tsog por 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong /kha cig gis ni
245b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa gtsug te ma 'gul ba ra mthong /kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgrengs te 'dug par mthong /kha cig gis ni kha phub tu 'dug par mthong /kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i
245b7(dkon brtsegs): steng na nyal bar mthong /kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong /kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krungs bcas te 'dug par mthong /kha cig gis ni brtsig
246a1(dkon brtsegs): pA lnga brnyes pa dang /kha cig gis ni shring ldeb la bArnyes pa dang /kha cig giswA ni gtun shing la brnyes pa dang /kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod nA ny+dzal
246a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongasu bsgyur ba dang /kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni rtso mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni rtswa bal pa dza'i gos
246a3(dkon brtsegs): gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni rtswa ku shri'i gos gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni rI dgas kyi lpags pa'i gos gyon pa dang /kha cig gis nir+ts+tsa tsI ra gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni
246a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgren mor 'dug pa dang /kha T+wA~Mg gis ni rtsa dar b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni shing shunagyi gos gyon pa dang /kha cig gis ni sre de za ba dang /kha cig gis
246a5(dkon brtsegs): ni nas za bar mthong ngo //kha cig gis ni rtsa ba za ba dang /lo ma za ba dang /me tog za ba dang /'bras bu zla ba dang /sdong bu za ba dang /gzegs ma za ba dang /pad+ma'i rtsa ba za ba dang //
246a6(dkon brtsegs): zhug drug smyung ba dang /sha mi za ba dang /rgya shugs za ba dang nus shin te ma za ba dang /TI tse za ba dang /mon sran+da sde'u za ba dang /mun sran dre'u za ba dang /bra yos za ba dang /
246a7(dkon brtsegs): til za ba dang /'bras skam za ba dang /chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /mar gyi thigs pa tsam gyis 'chi ba dang /sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tshe ba dang /'o ma'i
246b1(dkon brtsegs): thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /kha cig gris ni zas mi za ba dang /kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo //kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo //kha cig
246b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni 'greng ba 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo //zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang /dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston ste/lo drug tshangs par
246b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to//bairtul shugs shin tu khyad par dri 'phags pa dang /brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /dka'
246b4(dkon brtsegs): thob shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul shugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang /sems can gzhan dang gzhan la me mos pa dag gis brtul zhugs dang dka'o thub gzhan dang
246b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du mi mthong ste/gzhan du ci 'dra ba'i brtags zhugs dang /dka' thub tsa 'dra ba dag gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub mthong ba
246b6(dkon brtsegs): ni ma gtig s+ho//zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kho na ma tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yon la/bya ba de dgu la kun tu ston te/dka' ba spyad pa
246b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yong su smin par byaso//zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongasu sbyong ba byas pa de dag gis ni
247a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegru pa ni 'dug cang mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang /mi g.yo ba dang /bde ba myong ba dang /lho drug lon
247a2(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo //zhi ba'i blo gros de la lha dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa chos bstan pas yongasu smin par bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag
247a3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba ye shes chen

247a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang 'thun par khrus byas te/lus gtsang mar byas nas/klung ne ra na dza na nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to//de na grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ni hA/

247b1(dkon brtsegs): dradrung /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'byo chen pra byA byA b+hak+Sha drug nA yang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas/sau sla nas chog 'di skad du/k+She skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol
247b2(dkon brtsegs): cig kyi skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshes gastsal cig zer ro//zhi ba'i blo gros des na byang chub sems dpas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mi la sogs pa lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /
247b3(dkon brtsegs): dri za bye bo khrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi kha zas de dag blangs nas thams cad zos kyang phan tshun mi mthong ngo //lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpas bdag gis bshes
247b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol te/byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar sheso//de dag thams
247b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su smin par byas par gyur te/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpyas zas len par sbyar ba dka

247b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te lus stobs dang ldan par gyur nas zis zos te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo //der song ba dang /sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bus bzangs
248a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba sdu sa lnga spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bros te smras pa/sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi spyod pa//srid pa bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa/byang chub songal
248a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni shing drung byon//so gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya//legaso zhes te sa la spyod rnams dga'//stong gsum thams cad yongasu phyag der byed//me togau sil ma
248a3(dkon brtsegs): bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs//spos chu dag gos sa gzhi tshig chag btab//lago nA gzhong thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs//gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin bar snang la//

248a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khrang mdzes pa//de ltas stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan//'thob bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste//skyes bu
248a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir//mi mdzad 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun//na mkha' bai DUR+Ya'i dra bra bkab//dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang //

248b3(dkon brtsegs): nga bsgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che//rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa//'od gsal dri med dra ba cig kyang sprul//klu dang dri zlam+b+hi 'phye chen po dang //lha min mkho
248b4(dkon brtsegs): lding mi 'am cu kun gyis//rang rang gnas nas bkod pa rnams kyis ni//'dod khams legs par brgyan nus mdzes pa r+ya byaste//zhi ba'i blo gros de nas stong gsum gyi dbang

248b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bsnams pa/dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/glo cha sra ba brnabs pa/thugs yongasu mi skyob/byang chub sem
248b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bskyod pa thams cad nges par byung ba/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du byon pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/byang chub sems
249a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjesu zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad lnga shrIn

250a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi badrag pos de'i tshe tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso//sem can rnam dag brtul shugs chos nges pa//lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa//lha dang

261a4(dkon brtsegs): khri nyis stong par mthong ngo //lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pa la brtson zhing 'dul bar mthong ngo //kha cig gis ni bdud
261a5(dkon brtsegs): cig mthong ngo //kha cig gis ni bdud rgya chen por mthong ngo //kha cig gis nI byang chub sem+b+has dpa' bdud 'joms pa la brtse bar mthong ngo //
261a6(dkon brtsegs): cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing na mkha' la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na seng po'i khri lnga 'dug cing /byang chub sems
261a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/zhi ba'i blo gros de sbyor na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yul mtha' med pa yin te byang
261b1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'khod pa de dag glu yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par ni chud med par srung ngo //skye ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi snying po mchog
261b2(dkon brtsegs): dme par 'dug pa dang /sngon mthun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshod med grangs med pa
261b3(dkon brtsegs): dag nas lhags te mi 'jigs pa'i sgra brjod cing /shis pa'i sgra dang /bde ba'i sgra dang /kun dga' ba'i sgra dang /mgyogs pa'i sgra dang /myur ba'i sgra dang
261b4(dkon brtsegs): legs pa'i sgra dang /don yod pa'i sgra dang /dpa' ba'i sgra dang /skyes bu dam pa'i sgra dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /rgyas pa'i sgra dang /bkra shis pa'i sgra
261b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi gdud pa'i sgra dang /ma zhum pa'i sgra dang /sngon gyi bsam pa'i sgra dang /spong ba don yod pa'i sgra dang /yid bde ba'i sgra dang /rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i
261b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang /skyes bu dam pa rnam par rtse ba'i sgra dang /phan pa'i sgra dang /skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i sgra dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang /mngon par
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs por byang chub pa'i sgra brjod de/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi
262a1(dkon brtsegs): khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbugs 'byin pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag gis dbugs 'byin to//mchod pa rnam/
262a2(dkon brtsegs): bsna tshogs byed do//bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do//'di ni byang chub sems dpo'i sngon legs par spyad pa ste/des na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
262a3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dus po'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la dbugs 'byin cing mchod pa byed kyang
262a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de la yang rjesu chags pa med la bdud kyi sde la yang khong khro ba med do//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' rjesu chags pa dang /
262a5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro bo dang bral bas skad cigacig dang ldan pa'i shes par bya ba dang /blta bar bya ba dang /thob par bya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba

262a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis phyag g.yas pa rkyang ste/sku ma bsnyal tam zhes sbyin gsol to//bsnyel ba mi mnga' bar byang
262b1(dkon brtsegs): chub bam/rang byung du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bamya/sgrib pa mi mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis mngon
262b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par byang chub bam/kun tu ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/spyod yul mo 'dres pa dang ldan nam/snying rje chen po'i go cha
262b3(dkon brtsegs): byugos sam/dkon mchog ga sum gyi rigs pasab+hA sam/chos thams tsod la dbang bsgyur ram zhes yongs su 'dra'o//de la sems can grang dag dang
262b4(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de shes so//sems can gang dag dbang po yongs sum smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de mi shes so//zhi ba'i blo gros
262b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzums par chos kyi dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su bstan te/spyan mi 'dzums par byang chub
262b6(dkon brtsegs): ni shing la yang gzigs so//lha'i bu brgya stong yang de la mchod de bstod do//phyag 'tshal lo//lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do//
262b7(dkon brtsegs): bstod do//phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do//zhi ba'i
263a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa dang /rgyul po chen po bzhi lhung bzod rnams thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa'o
263a2(dkon brtsegs): gan du dong bar gyur to//bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor srung dang /'phrigs skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ste
263a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhi dgra go/gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar do dA ba de bzhin du rdogling bzhi pa bye ba khrag brgyu nas rgyal po bye ba khrag bzhi brgya lhung bzad
263a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams thogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan+d+ha du dong ngo //zhi ma'i blo gros de la de bzhin gaushegs pa sna lhung bzed bye ba phrag bzhi brgya rnams bzhes
263a5(dkon brtsegs): ti/bzhes nus kyang lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas rgyal po chen po re rI yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pos bdag gi lhung bzed bzhes
263a6(dkon brtsegs): so/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems te/de dag dgra' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med
263a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//lci ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chod pa ge gon
263b1(dkon brtsegs): drang /bzang po dang /gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur te/de dag ni sngon 'di skad du bdag cag/
263b2(dkon brtsegs): gim de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas 'bu lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa le thog mar zhal zas

263b5(dkon brtsegs): gshig pra chos kyi 'khor lo ma bsko ba'i byar du sems can gyi don mdzad pA de ni rab tu mang gi sems dang po bskyed po nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying par
263b6(dkon brtsegs): song ba'i bar du ni de lta ma yin no//zhi ba'i blo glos khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can
263b7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshangs pa gautsug phud can zhes bya ba tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu

264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bskor cing mdun du bdar tI/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin to//
264a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir sems can chos
264a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi snod du gyur pa dag mchis te/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa 'tshul bar 'gyur gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan du gsol/bde bar
264a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo//de ni sngon gyi smon laM kyi gyur pa ste gang gi/rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bur khas blangs nas

264b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab par gyur to//brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi
264b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab par gyur to/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor por gnang ba de'i tshe tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis grong

264b4(dkon brtsegs): paupo dA bikra ba lha ni sdug pa sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur to//ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur
264b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcu dang /brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das
264b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi seng ge'i khri bkra ba lta ni sdug pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bai shums par gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po wA
264b7(dkon brtsegs): saM ga la ba dang /drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags tshal ga la ba deng gshigs te phyin nas/seng+ge'i khri de dag thams cad la bdag nyid bzhugs par kun du bstan /
265a1(dkon brtsegs): de na re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so//bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyu
265a2(dkon brtsegs): ba shes te/de dag dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//bcom ldan
265a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das seng ge'i khI da la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur
265a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhug go//bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' ya
265a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ti 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhug ma thug tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam par gyur par gnas te lag mthil ltar
265a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can dmyal ba pa 'am/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa 'am/ga shin+d+ra rje'i 'jig rten pa 'am/
265a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am lha 'am/sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/sems can gong la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med cing
265b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gis ma yin/gti mug gis ma yin/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med cing cig la cig pa ma tsam du 'du shes te/byams pa'i sems dang
265b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan
265b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang
265b4(dkon brtsegs): che bA/dbang tsho bar grags po'i lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi
265b5(dkon brtsegs): mA yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar
265b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa dbang che ba/dbang che bar grags pa dag gis sa phyogs gang khyab
265b7(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur pa de ni tha ni skra'i rtse mo'i cha gzhag pa tsam yang med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas dran pa dang ldan zhing
266a1(dkon brtsegs): mthun bzhin du ting 'dzin de lam bgongs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan thugs rje chen pos bskyed pas/thams cad dang snyan pa 'dzod tu/
266a2(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par gzigs nas dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/gang yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskar ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to//
266a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lho de ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems can rnams rang rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin du kun du shes
266a4(dkon brtsegs): te/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir bskor te/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de

266a6(dkon brtsegs): na spyod paSh+pe lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang 'dus par gyur to//zhi ba'i blo gros de lnga gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du
266a7(dkon brtsegs): ko'u de n+ya mig mi rtag go zhes bka' stsal pa de la sdug bsngal gyi sgras 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngalo zhes thos so//bdag med pas 'dul ba
266b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes thos so//stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong ngo zhes thos so//zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig zhi ba'o/

266b3(dkon brtsegs): med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni myig nas med pa'o zhes thos so//sgyu ma lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes so thos so//rmi lam lta bus 'dul
266b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis ni mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes thos so//chu zla lta bus 'a dul ba rnams kyis ni mig chu zla lta bu'izhes thos so//mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams
266b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni myig mig yor lta bu'o zhes thos so//brag chu ste bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brug cha lta bu'o zhes thos//de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
266b6(dkon brtsegs): dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /skye ba med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
266b7(dkon brtsegs): dang smyon pa med pa nyid dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang ///ma skyes pa dang /ma byung bar thos so//rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis
267a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos so//mig la ji lta ba bzhin du yid kyi bar du rten cing 'brel par 'byung zhes thos so//
267a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang /sgra rnams dang /dri rnams dang /ro rnams dang /reg bya rnams dang /chos rnams stong ngo zhes thos so//kha cig gis ni
267a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po mi rtag pa dang /kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so//kha cig gis ni skye mched badrag med pa'o zhes thos s+ho//kha cig gis ni phung po mi
267a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa nyid du thos la khams la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no//kha cig gis ni khams lnga mi rtag pa nyid du thos la phung po la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no//
267a5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam par grol lo//kha cig gis ni kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo//kha cig gis ni 'gog pa'i sgras rnam par
267a6(dkon brtsegs): grol lo//kha cig gis ni lam gyi sgrasa? rnam par grol lo//kha cig gis ni dran pa nye bar grazheg pa'i gtam du thos so//khwa cig gis ni yang dgra pa'i spong

267b1(dkon brtsegs): gtam du b+h+yas so//kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi yan log gi gtam du thos sau//kha cig gis TI lam gyi gtAm+b+ha du thos s+ho//khyA cig gis ni zhi gnas kyi
267b2(dkon brtsegs): gtam du thoso//kha cig gis ni lhag mthong gi gtam du thos so//kha cig gis ni bden pa'i gtam du thos so//khwa cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan
267b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam du thos so//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so//kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so//
267b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pus sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to//zhi ba'i
267b5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros dri ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin po de ni dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang sems can de dag
267b6(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba'i rtogs pas lo brgyar yang rtogs par mi nus na/sems can gzha nu drug gis lta smos kyang ni dgos/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba spyad pa
267b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /bdud btul ba dang /bkod pa dang /seng ge'i sgra dang /rnam par rol pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'di

268a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag glo de skad ces bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa
268a4(dkon brtsegs): 'amaHcig tu ma gyur lags sam/'on te de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa rje su 'thun pa 'am cig tu lha'ang ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

268a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni 'di ltar
268a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gis lus la gnas pa lags kyi/'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das
268b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang su dag
268b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir chos sla ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na
268b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba pa'i bdag po gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi snga ma brlabs par sems can de dag dri bzhin gshegs
268b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i glasang ba smras pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni gnas ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs
268b5(dkon brtsegs): bas byin gyis mi brlabs pa rnams kyis/de bzhin grashegs pa'i gsang ba shes par ram/mnyan par ram//bshad par nus pa su zhig yod
268b6(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog du yang drug pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho ni'o//de bzhin
268b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
269a1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag
269a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bsten te bsnyad do//rab tu bshad do//
269a3(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdog po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang /yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 'jig rten thams cad
269a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mthun par 'gyur ro//gasnang ba pa'i bdag po ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni mgo bos bsgyel ba 'am phrag pa la thogs par nus kyi/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
269a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lA mos par ram/dad par r-im+b+ha/yid ches par yang mi nus na/blang bar rama?/kun chub
269a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya b.ru ram/gzung bar ram/sbyor bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ni gnas ma yin no//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dgachos kyi rnam
269a7(dkon brtsegs): grangaso 'di nyan pa dang /mos pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas bcu la ba ste ni bkur
269b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa ma yon gyi/gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bad+ma skyong mang po la bskyon bkur byas pa dang /bsod nams kyi
269b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis brtan pa dang /theg pa chen po 'di la nges par byas par rig par bya'o//gseng ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam po de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la
269b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/gnyis la ma yin/gsum lo ma yin/bzhi lo ma yin/lnga la ma yin/sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin
269b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /theg pa chen po 'di la dgra
269b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsu ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das lha byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
269b6(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi bra la/nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gang legs/gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
269b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so//nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun du rtog pa
270a1(dkon brtsegs): mngam mam maHsa sa masama.a mthatha thasamaShas mamamamama' mam mama.a/ma mama' ma
270a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yong su rtog pa nyo bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so//kun du rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /yongasu rtog pa nye bar/
270a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so//'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i
270a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgoso//phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so//rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma
270a5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig blo dag so//ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yaM ri 'dzin pa
270a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so//ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so//ming dang
270a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dog so//chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig
270a8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi bo'i tshig bla dgas so//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na dmigs pa dang /rgyu dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang
270b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de drug thams cad ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo //'dzag tshogs la lta bya nyo bar zhon lta ba thams cad nyo ba zhi'o//'jog tshogs la lta//
270b2(dkon brtsegs): bA nye bar zhi ni smon pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o//'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na
270b3(dkon brtsegs): shing gi rtsa ba bcad na yal ga dang /lo ma dang /yal ka phre'u thams cad skam par 'gyur ro//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhen
270b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu mi shes na nye bar len pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
270b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo //'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes par gyur na/nye bar len pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ste/gnod par mi 'gyur ro//zhi
270b6(dkon brtsegs): b.ri blo gros kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu 'tshal ba ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhi ba'i blo/
270b7(dkon brtsegs): gros bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes pa'o//sems can kun nas mi slong ba dang /srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas mi slong
271a1(dkon brtsegs): /ba ni 'dzag tshogs la lta bu yongs shes pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros lta ba de ni nang na yang mi gnas/phyi rol na yang mI gnas so//lta ba gnas pa
271a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes pa'o//zhi bya'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu
271a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas te/stong pa nyid kyi rje su 'thun pa'i bzod pas lta ba de mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di yang zhi ba'i blo gros
271a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /
271a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa med pa'i lta bas 'jig tshogs shes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di yang zhi ba'i blo klos 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros
271a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs zhes bya bu de ni tshogs ma yin pa/'byung ba ma yin pa/rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste/de ni bzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa kun brtags
271a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//'byung ba mo yin zhing kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su brtag pa ma yin/rnam par brtag pa ma yino//yongs su brtag pa ma yin
271b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin pa/rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa/bslang ba ma yin pa/shrIs+t+ra par bya ba ma yin pa'o//bye ba ma yin/
271b2(dkon brtsegs): pA dang /rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa dang /bslang ba ma yin pa dang /shes par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o//gsol po/nye bar
271b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang ldan pa nye ba ru zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba gang nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang ldan po zhes bgyi/bka' stsal pa/dmig sau pAs sems 'bar bar
271b4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro//mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na me ni rgyu
271b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'bar gyi/rgyu med na 'chi bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dmigs pa las sems 'bar gyi/dmigs pa med na zhi bar 'gyur ro///
271b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po bdun pa//zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems thabasA la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa
271b7(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do//nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang mi bskyed la pha rol tu phyin
272a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la dmigs pa yang bskyed do//bdud dang nyaM bya'i nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa yang slong la byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos lta
272a2(dkon brtsegs): dmig snga pa yang mi spong ngo //nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa la dmigs pa yang mi len la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs
272a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mi 'dor ro//stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la yang rab tu rtog la sems can thams cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang blta'o//zhi ba'i blo glos
272a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa la la dbang thob ste/ma skyes pa'i dmigs/
272a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la yod nges par sems lnga bsdams bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo //mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dmigs pa la yang 'dzug la dge ba'i
272a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa'i dri mi gas pa yang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa lnga yang spyod la byung
272a7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems kyi de migs pa yang chud mi gson to//smon pa med pa'i/dmigs pa yang rnam par mthong la khams gsum pa'i dmi gas pa yang
272b1(dkon brtsegs): mI smod do//shes rab dang thab sa las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed pUr g+hurarA to/de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas de bzhin gshogs/
272b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku sdug pa la sems gnas so//mi rtag pa la dmigs nas 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du gnas so//sdug bsngal la dmigs nas
272b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so//bdag med pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen
272b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems gnas so//'dod chags la dmigs nas sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas so//zhe sdang la dmigs nas sems can zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la byams pa chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so//gti
272b6(dkon brtsegs): mug la dmigs nas sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams lo rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so//cha mnyam
272b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la dmigs nas sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag po'i 'du shes kyis sprin chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so//'dod
273a1(dkon brtsegs): /chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so//zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs nas rang srungs rgyas su
273a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar sems gnas so//gti mug dang bral bas dmigs nas byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so//gzugs la dmigs nas de bzhin
273a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnas so//sgra la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par bya bar sems gnas so//
273a4(dkon brtsegs): dri la dmigs nas nga bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thob par bya bar sems granas so//ro la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
273a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar sems gnas so//reg bya la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam
273a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so//chos la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems
273a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so//sbyin pa la dmigs nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so//tshul khrims la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
273b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par bya bar sems gnas so//bzod pa la dmigs nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang /gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lpags pa thob par bya
273b2(dkon brtsegs): bar sems gnas so//brtson 'grus la dmigs nas semasu can thams cad bsgral bar sems gnas so//bsam gtan la dmigs nas mngon
273b3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so//shes rab la dmigs nas sems can thams cad kyi lha ba dang /nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa
273b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun gcod par sems gnas so//byams pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnas so//snying rje la
273b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so//dga' ba la dmigs nas chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar bya bar sems
273b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas so//btang snyoms la dmigs nas sems can rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba spang ba la sbyang bar sems gnas so//bsdu ba'i dngos po la
273b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nas sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so//ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gau tang bar sems

274a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyon la dmigs nas bzod pa'i stobs dang nges pa la sems gnas so//le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongasu bsgrub/

274a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byas
274a5(dkon brtsegs): nas theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par sems gnas so//yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so//
274a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro ngan song yid la byas nas ngan 'gro dang ngan song dang mi khom par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad yong skye su bskyab par sems gnas so//lha
274a7(dkon brtsegs): yid la byas nas 'byor po thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnas so//mi yid la byas nas snying po blang bar sems gnas so//sangs
274b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar sems gnas so//chos rjesu dran pa yid la byas nas slob dpon chos la dpe mkhyud
274b2(dkon brtsegs): med par bya bar sems gnas so//dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bor sems gnas so//gtong ba rjes su
274b3(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yid la byas nas gtong ba thams cad yongs su btang bar sems gnas so//tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas spen pa dang /bsam
274b4(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang /byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so//lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas lha thams cad kyis bstod cing
274b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa'i songs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems gnas so//lus yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya bar sems gnaso//
274b6(dkon brtsegs): dge yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so//sems yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems thob par
274b7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar sems gnas so//'dus byas la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so//'dus ma
275a1(dkon brtsegs): byas la dmigs nas sa sa rgyus kyi yA shes+t+ra yongs smra rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/zhu ba'i blo gros de ltar na byung
275a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigos pa de gang yang med do//byang chub sems dpa'i
275a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub tu yongasu bsgos pa'o//chos thams cad byang chub kyi rje su song bar mthong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs/
275a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa ste/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas las skye ba ni skyo ba ji ltar skyes pa'i sems
275a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhos pa'i byang chub kyi phyir
275a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyad pa dang /byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yong med do//zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na gzugs gling
275a7(dkon brtsegs): ci yang rung ste de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du thabs la ma khas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/
275b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa gang ci yang rung ste do thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang /byas pa/
275b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gzo ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sems can
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag khro ba la spyod pa dang /le lo can de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
275b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag glen pa dang /rmongs pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa'a'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab
275b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag phan mi 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro//
275b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gong dag phan 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag bsngags pa brjod pa
275b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' sro shi bar mi
276a1(dkon brtsegs): mngam pasamam mtshams sa ma mamasamasa.a mthan thasamaShas mamamamamams ma mams thams ma maman ma masaka/yas masaya
276a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpal snying rje chen po skye'o//sems can gang dag bde ba de dag/
276a3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skye'o//sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang /dumu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
276a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas kyi sems skye'o//sems can gang dag cang shes po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzo ba'i blo skye'o//sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs
276a5(dkon brtsegs): can yin pa de dag lo byang chub sems dpa' rjesu bsrung ba'i blo skye'o//sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' tshad
276a6(dkon brtsegs): pas bcad pa dang /bsdigs pa dang gdams pa'i blo skye'o//sems can gang dag zur tsam gyis go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpe' zab mo'i gtam

284a1(dkon brtsegs): num yang rngo mi thog/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po
284a2(dkon brtsegs): che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'dus la mngon par gtor ro//me tog gi phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste/

284a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo glos kyis gsung ba pa'i bdag po lag nu rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//gsang ba pa'i bre drag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas

284a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan/smras pa/rig kyi bu thob par bya ba med par lung bstan pa thob po/smras pa/ci zhig thob pa med/smras pa/sems can dang /srog dang /gong thog dang

284b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang //

288b7(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i khor gyi khyams bkod pa

290b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshong bab pa gsol pa/thub pa chen po dus 'di
291a1(dkon brtsegs): lcags/skyes bu gtso bo gshug su gsol//skyes bu dam pa gshogasu gsol//skyes bu cang mkhyen gshegasu gsol//thub pa chen po gdugs/
291a2(dkon brtsegs): tshod bab//rkang gnyis gtso bo gshegasu gsol//rkang gnyis dam pa gshegasu gsol//rkang gnyis cang mkhyen gshegasu gsol//tshul khrims pad+ma'i rdzing nas
291a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrungs//brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam par 'phel//slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa//thub pa pad+ma gshegs su gsol//'phags pa'i bden pa gnas bcas te//byams
291a4(dkon brtsegs): dang thugs rje'i spyan mnga' zhing //bdag med pa yi sgra sgrogs pa//rgyal ba seng ge gshegs su gsol//khrims ni rtsa ba chu ba dran//byang chub yan lag me togau brgyan//
291a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs//rgyal ba slong po gshegs su gsol//shes rab tu chen zab pa po//ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing //rnal 'byor pa yi tshong
