298a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/bdag po med pa/byed pa po med pa/tshor ba po med pa
298b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rgyun las byung ba'o//'di la 'jug pa 'am/ldob pa 'am/rjes su 'jug pa'i cho sna gang yang med de/gzhan du na yang dag bla ma yin pa/kun du gti mug pas
298b2(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba
298b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ma gtogs so//yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du gti mug pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos srung gi byed pa por 'gyur ba myed do//
298b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la byeng pa po mi dmigs pa de la 'jug pa med ldog pa med do zhes bdod par bya'o//de chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do//the tshom mi za'o//chos
298b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/de gzugs la mi chags so//char ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shrIs pa la mi chags so//
298b6(dkon brtsegs): de mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes lnga lnga mi chags so//rna ba dang /b+hU dang /lce dang /lus dang yid dang /chos rnams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa
298b7(dkon brtsegs): la mi chags so//chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis spyod pa dang /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so//grogs po dag de ltar dad pa la gnas
299a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bya chub sems dpa' nis sa rgyas mthong ba la sa songs su rnams m+bu 'gyur/rnam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun ya stan pa
299a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//de gang dang gang du skyes bla de dang der sangs rgyus mthong ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba
299a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro//dwer skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur/dge
299a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos yongs su bitsal bya la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro//de btsun 'grus brnamyos pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer byir mi 'gyur ro//chung ma dang
299a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /bu mo dang /bran po dang /bran mo dang /lus byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pasdu yongs su spyod pa don du gnyer bAr mi 'byung ba te/de na
299a6(dkon brtsegs): tshod gnon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas ni tshod mdzes pa la bab pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur tu
299a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ngo //de dad pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /dge ba'i grongs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang /dag paN+DI bsam pa 'thob po//
299b1(dkon brtsegs): de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i tshos rnams nyan to//bsgrub pa snying por byed kyi tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no//mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson
299b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'thob pa dang bkur bsti dang /tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar/gzhan dog la
299b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par ston to//bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to//de ji ltar thos pa dang /ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la chos
299b4(dkon brtsegs): ston to//chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po thob po//sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed do//de mang du thos par gyur pas lus dang /srog la mi lta
299b5(dkon brtsegs): bA ya ni/'dod pa chung ba dang /chog shes pa dang /rab tu dben pa dang /mgu slu ba dang /gso sla ba dang /dgon pa dang /khas mthar mngon par dge' ba yin/
299b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la yongs su rtog pa yin no//do na lA ston pa yin te/tshig 'brul ston pa ma yin no//lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
299b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi ston par 'gyur ba yin no//bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas
300a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo//bag yod pa lhur len pa yang yin te/de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste dbang po sdom pa'o//de mig gis
300a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon brtag su mi 'dzin pa yin no//de gzugs rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /nye sde dmigs dang 'byung ba yang yang
300a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang /snas dri rnams dang /lces ro rnams dang /lus kyis reg bya rnams dang /yid kyis
300a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon brtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /nyes dmigs dang /'byung ba yang yang dag pa
300a5(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/'di ni phyag yod pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang /gzhan gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang /
300a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang /chos la dga' bo'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam
300a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang /lus kyis nyes par spyod
300b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /
300b2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu bo med pa ste/'di ni brag yod pa zhes bya'o//grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i
300b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang /bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin//gasdang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa mang ba dang rtag tu 'thun pa dang /chos don du gnyer ba dang /chos 'dod/
300b4(dkon brtsegs): por bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol du ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te/de'i sems nyes par spyod pa la mi 'gro'o//
300b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin tA sangs rgyas
300b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do//'phags pa'i lam la gnas so//che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo//gsang po pa'i bdag po che ba nyid thob nas che ba nyid 'di lta ste/dri bzhin
300b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shan
301a1(dkon brtsegs): /du grub pa dang /bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson par bya'o//gsong ba pa'i bdag po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs par
301a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di ji ltar lha de ba la ltos/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin du brtson par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i
301a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/gsang ba pa'i bdag po bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba las
301a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su bsrung ba dang /yul 'dor ba dang /'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang /chos kyi
301a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba la bsten pa dang /'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam parartog pa rnams kyi rgyu
301a6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang /mi dge ba rnams dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /chags pa dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med
301a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas don len rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa nas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rgyu ba med pa ste/'di ni
301b1(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa zhes bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa nges brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang /dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang
301b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang ljon pa des dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson
301b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o//dran pa dang shes bzhi ni des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro///gsang ba po'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang /btson
301b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gru sa dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin sbyor ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang
301b5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so//gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so//de la yod pa ni gang med pa ni gang zhe na/yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags
301b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do/'di ni yod pa zhes bya'o//de la med pa gang zhe na/log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/de ni med pa zhes
301b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//gzhan yang las dang rnam par sman pa ni yod do//gang las de dang rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa de ni med do//gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /
302a1(dkon brtsegs): lce dang /lus dang /yid ni yod do//gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni med do//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
302a2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do//le lo can la ni byang chub med do//phyin ci logs las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag ni yod do//rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med//
302a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do//rtag pa dang brten pa dang /ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang /yang
302a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do//de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /'gyur pa'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang /'du shes
302a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni yod do//rtag pa dang brten pa dang /ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang /yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas
302a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do//gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba de dag ni yod do//ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dri dag
302a7(dkon brtsegs): med do//'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do//'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med do//rnam par shes pa'i rkyen
302b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni yod do//rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugasu zhes bya ba de ni med do//ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de
302b2(dkon brtsegs): ni yod do//ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug ces bya ba de med do//skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do//skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba
302b3(dkon brtsegs): de med do//reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba da ni yod do//reg pa med na tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni med do//tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de na yod do//tshor ba med
302b4(dkon brtsegs): nu sred pa zhes bya ba de med do//sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do//skyed pa med na len pa zhes bya ba med do//len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod///
302b5(dkon brtsegs): len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de med do//srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do//srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de ni med do//skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
302b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngags pa dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams ni yod do//skye ba med na rga shi dang mya ngan dang /smre sngags
302b7(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams med do//gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do//sbyin pas dbul por
303a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni med do//tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do//tshul khrims kyis ngan snong du skye ba ni med do//thos pas shos
303a2(dkon brtsegs): rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do//thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do//bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do//bsgoms pas 'bral bar
303a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba ni med do//tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na/nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do//tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon
303a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do//mngon pa'i nga rgyal can l-i ni kun shes pa brda sprod pa med do//mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do//gzhan
303a5(dkon brtsegs): yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do//nang gi rjes su song ba'i bdag ni med do//ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do//nga rgyal dang ldan
303a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni 'byung ba med do//bdag gam sems can nam srog gam gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do//gsang ba po'i bdag po de ltar na bag yod pa dang /tshul
303a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so//'jig rten na
303b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so//du yang du zhes tha smad 'dogs pa la yang ma chags so//myed do zhes tha spyad 'dogs pa la
303b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi chags te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pas
303b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mdor bsdus te/chos kyi mdo bzhir rnam par bzhag go//bzhi gang zhe na/dge sbyong dang bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang /lha tshe rings po rtag par
303b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang /lha dang mi bde bor 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug
303b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /mu steg can bdag du smra ba rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do//zhes bya ba dang /rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon
303b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom po'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba zhes bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin+da du mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla
303b7(dkon brtsegs): dgas so//sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas so//bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so//mya ngan
304a1(dkon brtsegs): lngas 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so//gsang bya ba'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad
304a2(dkon brtsegs): la de ltar mos shing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams zhing yongs su nyams par mi
304a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces
304a4(dkon brtsegs): gsil to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi ji ltar 'jig rten bskyong bar bgyi de nas
304a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grogs po dag khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyongs shig/de la
304a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/srog gcod pa spong pa dang /rang gi long sna spyod kyis chog par 'dzin
304a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gzhan gyi chung ma la mi 'phyo ba dang /chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang /gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang /tha ba'i tshig med de zher mi 'debs
304b1(dkon brtsegs): mam mtshams sa mamasamasa.a mthatha thasamaShas mthamamama' thamam/tham amaka/ thamam
304b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te/gzhan mi slu ba dang /gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang /gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang /lta ba yongs su dag cing yang
304b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par song ba ste/grogs pa drag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o//grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de//
304b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na'adi lta ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /bla ma la gus pa dang /thams cad du 'thun par 'dzin pa dang /drang po dang /mnyen pa dang /
304b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /sdig pa thams cad mo byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/grogs po dag
304b6(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o//grogs po dag gzhan yang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/drug gang zhe na//
304b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste ston pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang /sems can thams cad lo byams pa'i lus kyi pra kyi wa~M 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i
304b8(dkon brtsegs): chos dga' bar byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /dpa' bar bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /bus par bya ba dang /bsgom pa dang /
305a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba dang /ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o//de bzhin du ston pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang /
305a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag dang /yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /yid du 'ong
305a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang /dga' bar byed pa dang /bla mar bya ba dang /gus par bya ba dang /bsgom par bya ba dang /bsdu ba dang /ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba
305a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o//rnyed pa gang dag chos dang mthun pa'i chos kyis rnyed pa tha na lhu bzed kyi nang du chud pa 'am/lhung bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'o rnyed pa
305a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa thabs mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rnyed pa 'thun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa
305a6(dkon brtsegs): drang /bla mur byed pa dang /yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /dga' bar bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /gus par bya ba dang /bsgom pa dang /bsngo ba dang /
305a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o//tshul khrims ma nyams po skyon med pa/'dren ma ma yin pa/bsra bsro ma yin pa rang dbang can ma 'gags pa mkhas bra
305b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis ma spyad pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang /
305b2(dkon brtsegs): lhan gcig tu tshul khrims mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur pa'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /mgu bar byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /
305b3(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /dga' bar bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /gus par bya ba dang /bsgom par dang /bsdu ba dang /ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur pa
305b4(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa'o//lto ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba nges paro 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang /sdug bsngal mthar
305b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bus tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig du lta ba 'thun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos
305b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /dga' bar byed pa dang /bla mar bya ba dang /gus par bya ba dang /bsgom pa dang /bsdu
305b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /ting nge 'dzin du bye b.ro 'gyur ba drug pa ste/grogs po dag yang dag par mgu bor bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o//grogs
306b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub
306b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag des 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o//snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
306b3(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po des klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med kyi gnas su gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag smras pa de dag dang /byang chub kyi snying po mchog
306b4(dkon brtsegs): dam par 'dug nas 'gro ba la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyin ngas sems kyis dran pas gang dag smras pa de dag khyod kyis dran na ma/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dran
306b5(dkon brtsegs): legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig/de nas ge kyang ba ba'i bdag
306b6(dkon brtsegs): po lag na rdo rje bstan lase langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tsog tsog por 'dug nas leg pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/gsang sngags
306b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig 'di dge smras so//'di lta ste/a hu ya/phu la ba trI/hu la ra t+naH/a gu hA/tsa tsa tsa tsa tse/nai Shu rat+nA/k+Sh+ya tA k+Sha ya bA ya/armA ya sa m+me/
307a1(dkon brtsegs): sha mA nAM ku rA/ha rbu lA hu bA t+ti/khi ba ti/kin a gaiSh+Thi ta/nas sa sA rASh+Ta/dzadzadzadza mu ti/a btA/ni bA tA/brta ba nus nA/
307a2(dkon brtsegs): b+hUtan+su/s+thi ti ho/ma nu Sha m+bu s+thIti ho//de ng+ku nr-i smr-i te ho/nA gA nA ma rak+Sha nAmA/gan d+ha b+ha na ma/kin+na nI rA nam/ma ho ra grad+d+ha ma/sU stA ri b+hi ba tu sarba sat+k+r-i naima?/
307a3(dkon brtsegs): b+h+r-i ki ran tu ma hA barba ta/sa ma byA thA tAn/hra ra ne/gar+dz+dza tu sa mu bri bi ga/oM ti/gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu
307a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yos sa thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so//rgya mtsho chen po yang rab tu 'khrugs so//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang 'dar pad pad nas/bcom ldan
307a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams de la zhabs gcig gis reg par mdzad do//de nas thams
307a6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la me reg tsam du nye bar 'jug ste/'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bsrung du gsol
307a7(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag bskyab du gsol/bdag cag la gnod lags so//bdag cag la rab tu gnod lag so//bdag cag 'dir phad pade lags so//bcom
307b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni 'di lta ste//
307b2(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa dang /khyed kyang na mkha' la gnas nas rab tu g.yos pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang
307b3(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams su ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /sems can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams
307b4(dkon brtsegs): blangs par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bston to////bam po dgu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes/bcom
307b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la rin po che'i dra bas mngon par bkab nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na bla na med
307b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
307b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na/khong khro ba med pa'i byams pa chen
308a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyan po dang /yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying po rje chen po dang /bya ba thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang /stong pa nyid
308a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang /thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang /dus gsuM du yongs su sbyong ba'i
308a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang /bden pa mthong ba rnam par sbyang bar bye ba sgrib pa med pa dang /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang /ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongasu
308a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lam la 'jug pa ste/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos
308a5(dkon brtsegs): can du 'gyur ro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
308a6(dkon brtsegs): dpu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos ni mi dngang mi skrag cing mi 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu byang chub
308a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i chos brgyad dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos nas mi dang mi skrab par mi 'gyur te/brgyad gang zhe na/shes rab kyis
308b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa yin/ye shes kyis brtan pa yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par yin/rgya chen po la mos pa yin/sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las nges
308b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba yin/chos la mi rtag par mos pa yin/sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa
308b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nA mi dngang ma skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ro//
308b4(dkon brtsegs): gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na bgyi ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
308b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/legs par bsgoms shing nyams
308b6(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo yongs su bsgoms pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yin/tshangs pa'i bla ma 'jig rten las 'dra
308b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshad pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/thams cad kyis rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i thabs dang shes rab las nges par 'byung ba yin te/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'
309a1(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sku du
309a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can gyi dbang po
309a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang /tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang /skad thams cad kun du 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzungs kyi sgo dang /chos mi
309a4(dkon brtsegs): zad pa bstan pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo ste/gzhon nu chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
309a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchisaM/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste
309a6(dkon brtsegs): dgu gang zhe na/snying rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang /phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /shes rab chen por bya ba'i
309a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir thos pa'i stongs dang /rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi re mos pa'i stobs dang /'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs dang /sems can
309b1(dkon brtsegs): skyung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang /bdung tshur bcad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang /
309b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'o stobs te/gzhon nu dgu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so//bstan pa 'di bshad
309b3(dkon brtsegs): pa na gsang ba ba'i bdage bo'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/de dgra bzod pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
309b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gas ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang /sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grags pa de'agyu
309b5(dkon brtsegs): ba da /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du na 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis rlabs
309b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsong ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje l-i bka' stsal pa/
309b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lte ste/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar bcad par bya ba'i
310a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngas khyod la bskul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba dang /bdud kyi sde 'ongs pa na bdud
310a2(dkon brtsegs): tshar bcad pa'i phyir ngas khyod kyis gsong sngags kyi gzhi gang dag bsams shing brjod pa dang /kha don byas pa de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shigi/de nas gsang
310a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ba'i bdag po log na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
310a4(dkon brtsegs): la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so//tad ya thA/hu lu hu lu/
310a5(dkon brtsegs): hU le d+hu rai/hA rI tI/e ku sha la k+Sha ye/tsA la tsi la ba ti/sA rI/krU re/klan ti ba laM/k+She me/shan ti ka re/k+Sha mI/sha me/hu lu/u l-i khi/
310a6(dkon brtsegs): khi ri khi ri/A be sha na sI ra Ne/dza ye dza ya ba ti/sI re a brti/bi brti/a brti nau/me ti/b+hU tA nAnA/sa dra he da mi/da ma sam ban na rti nA/
310a7(dkon brtsegs): ta ra ya se swa ya na/swa sti de baM byo/nA ge byo/yak+She byo/gan d+harba rAk+Sha se b+h+yo/ma nu Sho/a ma nu She b+h+ya swa sti ri b+ha ba tu swa dA su kham/gsang sngags 'di
310b1(dkon brtsegs): mngaga' ya mam cam ngan aHma cam sa.a na thamasamasa.a nacan thasamathas mamathamamab mas tham tham ma sa thamamam thamams mam yam sa maHa/mamatha Tha yam tham ma a'
310b2(dkon brtsegs): dag rab brjod pas//ri yi rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos//sa yang rab tu g.yos pa gyur//chu yi rgyal po rnams kyang 'khrugs//gsung sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas//
310b3(dkon brtsegs): phas kyi rgol ba rnams char yang gcod//chos smra ba ni yang dag bsdus//chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs//gsang sdigs gzhi 'di thos nas ni//lha tshogs kun du dgar
310b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas//de ma chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes//phan tshun du ni smra bar byed//stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos//'khor kyang rab tu 'dar gyur nas//mi yi dbang
310b5(dkon brtsegs): bo'i zhabs gnyis la//btugs par byas te skyabs su dong //de dag mi 'jigs der phyin nas//ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to//mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs pas
310b6(dkon brtsegs): na//dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag bdun 'das nas su/sems can tshad med
310b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gi don mdzad nas zhag bdun 'das te/lcang lo can+da gyi pho brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas/gsang ba pa'i
310b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar
311a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin+d+ra dang /na mkha'
311a2(dkon brtsegs): lding du mas ni bskor/brgya byin dang tshungs po dang /'jig rten sbyong ba rnams kyis ni mngon par bstod/'od zer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed/rol mo'i sili snyan ni
311a3(dkon brtsegs): len/me tog gi char ni 'bebaso//zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyis mthu chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /sangs rgyas
311a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang /sangs rgyas
311a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod lam chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa rna chen po snga/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/slar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la byon to//
311a6(dkon brtsegs): gsong ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cad bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang b.raro gyur to//bzhud pa dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o//
311a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan
311b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe/nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang /rgyal po ma skyes
311b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pang rig nas phye ma rod kyi dus tshe/me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa thogs te/rgyal po'i
311b3(dkon brtsegs): khab kyi grong khyer chen po na byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
311b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na mdun khang
311b5(dkon brtsegs): na mchis na gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin mchis te/'di skad ces mchi'o//yab bcom ldan 'das ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor
311b6(dkon brtsegs): du gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs shes gda'o zhes mchis nas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/gang gis slad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po
311b7(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshes
312a1(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'di ltar bang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang ba'i sems can de ni sems can b+hi ris na gang yang ma mchis te/sems can rnams pa
312a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa lung bstan pa lung bstan
312a3(dkon brtsegs): pas glas ba pa'i bdeg po lag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid chen po ni dro mtshar ti snyam bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
312a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na des 'di 'dre ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/de skad ces
312a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po me skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po sems can dge ba'i rtse bre ma skyed pa rnams kyis ni
312a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di la myos par dka' ste/'on gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa rnams bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
312a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig
312b1(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/de dag gi gan nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas
312b2(dkon brtsegs): des na spongs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus ni skal
312b3(dkon brtsegs): ba grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya che ba/tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i skal pa la 'jig
312b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya b.ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa
312b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kho lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/bcom
312b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhini gshogs pa rnam par zhi spyod do//rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis sus nga srog kyang btang ste/brtson 'grus brtsamo par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtas
312b7(dkon brtsegs): 'de' shig yang dag par ston pa/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyong so shes bya ba 'khor t+na 'dus par gyur to/'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
313a1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus dang srog kyang btang ste/brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes
313a2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal ba la/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'chil ba ltar na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'dasnyamya du myung
313a3(dkon brtsegs): dubla nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni le lo can du glegs pa legs pa snyam du bdag bgyid do//
313a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i skad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpe'i brtson 'grus brtsamos pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skye ba'i blo skye bar mi 'gyur te/bcom ldan
313a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyi/mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma legs
313a6(dkon brtsegs): te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa lag so//de tsa'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
313a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus la mos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni ches bde'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
313b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms can gyi don la brtson pa drod nA dzan+ta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don bamed pa de lta de myur da bar Sh+Tagyu te/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'das na slad kyis
313b2(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig bgyi bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpepa la po ba'i de ri mo myong byar 'khor ba spyod yul du bats+tsha sa te/mya dun las
313b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa spyod yul du mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang ba 'khor ba spyod yul du ba byed cing sems can gyi don la
313b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur/chos tshad ma mchis pa ston par 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchis pa yongs su smin par
313b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid pa ni sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug go/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
313b6(dkon brtsegs): sedra 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni btad snyoms su lcang lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'i khar ba'i snod yu la m+b+hi rtagon byed yul mu
313b7(dkon brtsegs): por ltung ste/slad kyi sems can gyi don ma byed/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas por mi 'gyur shing /sems can thams cad kyi ra'i che bar mi
314a1(dkon brtsegs): logs so//de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'tshal zhing sems can yongs su/
314a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod
314a3(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'khor bso skrag pa'i spyod yul ba lag so//byang chub sems
314a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul la gnas par bgyi'o///
314a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen pos de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' stobs la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//skyes bu dam pa
314a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so//byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par bya ste/rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i
314a7(dkon brtsegs): gnon gyi spyod yul lba spyad mi bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rangagi spyod yul gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub
314b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul 'di lta ste 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang /nyan thos dang rang
314b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa med pa dang /nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la khams gsum du yang mchims sbyor ba dang /sel ba dang sdud pa dang /dge
314b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang /tshul la mkhas pa dang /bsdu ba shes pa dang /dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas pa dang //zad pa yang shes la bsod nams kyi tshogs
314b4(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa la yang mkhas pa dang /skye ba med par yang rab tu rtog pa la bsams bzhin du skye ba la yang mkhas pa dang /sems can yang med la sems can yongs su smin
314b5(dkon brtsegs): ra byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang /chos thams cad dben par yang shes la dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la yang mkhas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nim
314b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba la yang mkhas pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku yin par shes la mtshan dang dpe byad bzung po/
314b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan rnam par bsgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la yang mkhas pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med par yong shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod
315a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang mkhas pa dang /'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su sbyong la don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi tso bya'o
315a2(dkon brtsegs): cog la yang mkhas la lus dang sems dben par dga' ba yang shes pa dang /chos bstan pa yong mi 'drer la smra ba la smad pa la mkhas pa dang /bsam gtan yong bskyed
315a3(dkon brtsegs): la bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar yang mi byed pa dang /chos zab mo rtogs pa yang shes la sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su yang 'jug cing gtam yang dag pur
315a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa la yang mkhas pa dang /'byung ba med par yang shes la bsams bzhin du srid pa yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /lhag mthong yang shes la 'bras bu thob par mi byed

315b1(dkon brtsegs): skyospyong yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
315b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni nga mtshur lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdog gis
315b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dang bdag sems pa ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags pa snyam bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das kyis
315b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/gnas lags po dang /gzugs snang ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang /nam mkha'i spyod yul la sgrib pa ma mchis pas gzugs su gda' ba thaMng

315b7(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa 'am/sman gyi shing ljon pa 'am/tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa 'am/me tog gi shing ljon pa'am/'bras bu'i shing ljon pa 'am/spos kyi shing ljon pa gang /

316a4(dkon brtsegs): slob pa'i chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag lags pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnam so//

316b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i she nga ye shes kyang /nyan thos dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang 'dres par

317a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po log na rdo rje lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa de ci lci ba zhig gam/'on te yang ba zhig/gang gi phyir na gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di stobs kyi
317b1(dkon brtsegs): shugs chen po bdog pa zhes bya snyam mo//de nas gsang ba pA'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di

317b4(dkon brtsegs): yang ba yin no//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sa phyogs de rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang /de gzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen

318a1(dkon brtsegs): /'das dun d+hA rnan du chen pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang dz+nyAn tA/go cha dang yu la bskon pa'i glang po che yut+pa lag pa la gcig gis bdag pa'i rdo thog
318a2(dkon brtsegs): na bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bsna pa'am bsgral po'i rdo yang mthog na bdag par lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkul

318b5(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul
318b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i mchig tu bstan pa yin na/rdo rje 'di si'i steng 'di nas theg cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du bsams te/gal te bden

319a1(dkon brtsegs): de la bzung ba dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos te/chu yang gnam du
319a2(dkon brtsegs): brgalnga zhing rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje bskyod pa 'am bskul byar ma nus so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa myo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan

319a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal nu rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthil gcig tu 'jog go//bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
319a6(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di yang dper bgyi nu mi la la zhig gis ka rA sha pa ni gcig 'dzub mo'i rtse myos skye bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis sgra bzlog go//bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang
319a7(dkon brtsegs): zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mche ba yang ga/gis thogs par bgyidado//ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa ya cig gis blangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
319b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam mngamachams samathamasams mthan thasamamathas namamamamamam mamams ma yams/masas thamams

319b3(dkon brtsegs): du yang mchis/bdag gis ri rab tsam gyis kham de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa 'am bskul ba'i rngo

319b5(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa ni med mod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs 'di nyan thos dang /rang
319b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lto smos kyang ci dgos/mo'u dgal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi
319b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed dag na rI'i rgyal po ri rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa 'am bsgul bar nus kyi rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa 'am bskul bar mi nus so//tshe dang ldan
319b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang po pa'i bdag po la go na rdo rje ni stobs che ba lags so//bcom ldan/
320a1(dkon brtsegs): 'angs sa /sbrulA /mon dgas sa sa gsun tu s+yA dz+nyAn dran//na po kham stanar rung rdzu spyod stod pa do dag rag/
320a2(dkon brtsegs): tu b+hu g+ha da ni 'ardeg par nus kyi rdo rje 'dini brdeg par mi nus sa//de nas gnas ga ni ma du pal ni rten po mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la 'diska
320a3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di'i chang bas gsang bya ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni stongs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te ngo mtshar te//
320a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ci lags bsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs te pha m+b+ha las gyur pa lags sam/n+ma te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags/bcom
320a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/man dgal gyi bu pha ma las gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci yad rung ste 'jug pA tsam+ba mI bstan par zad do//gal te byang chub
320a6(dkon brtsegs): sems pal rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus pad+ma bstan+da na/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jog rten mAs myos por 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
320a7(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lha ba/ngas kyis phyogs thams cad kun du gzigs te/gsang ba ba'i bag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'i stsal te//gsang ba pa'i bdag pa spya
320b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par byas nas sa'i steng de
320b2(dkon brtsegs): nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te steng gi bar snang du 'phangs nas des de bar snang la lan bdun bskor te lag pa g.yas par bzhag go//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
320b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po leg na rdo rje

320b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
320b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob ste/bcu gang zhe na/rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog yongs su
320b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong gi dam pa'i chos ni yongs su mi gtong ba dang /sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa dang /sems can mthu chung de rnams la brjod

321b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rlung shis kyi 'gror//rgyal ba mi sbyis dus sa gsol bya/bcom ldan 'das dang pa'i sgomathun pa ci lcogs/bcom ldan 'das kyis

322a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mthun pa ni longs spyod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po thos pa'i

325b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sngon gyi dang ba yongasu dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lug na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//gsang ba
325b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdage po gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang /rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin

326a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ny-i zhes gsungs te/de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gol ba yin//gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /mi 'gal ba de dam
326a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yino//dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de brtag par mi nus te des na dam pa'i chos shes bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag

326a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'o//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/smras pa//

326b1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'ga'o//'jig rten ni rtag pa dang 'do ba dang bdag dang /bdag gir smra ba yin la/d+he ni mi rtam pa dang /sdug bsngalta ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mau sdug pa dang
326b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gi med par smra ba smin te/des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'ga'o//'jig rten ni rgyun phyogasu 'gro ba yin la/de ni rgyun las dazlog ste 'a glo bas des

326b4(dkon brtsegs): rten ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la de ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/des na 'jig rten tha~Mng dang
326b5(dkon brtsegs): 'galo//zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis nA/gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin to//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod dam
326b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin tam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu yongasu 'dzin te/bdag yongasu mi 'dzin/sems can yongasu mi 'dzin chos yongasu mi 'dzin to//smras pa/ji
326b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar yong su mi 'dzin/smras pa/bdag dben pa dang /sems can dben pa dang /chos dben pa dang /bdag dang sems can dang chos dben pa ma yin pa dang /'das pa

327a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa leg so legs//'di ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'o//
327a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang /mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /gang chos thams cad la mtshan dang spros
327a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'dzin pa dang /kun du spyod pa med pa dang /gang yongasu rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o//de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyal po bzang zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du
327a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nye ba zhi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' lag so//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bkas
327b1(dkon brtsegs): ni nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i tshod lags te/nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka'o//bcom ldan 'das de la gang dag dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mthong ba//
327b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag nye bar zhi ba lags te/de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags mched po ma lags 'bar bar bgyid pa ma lag so//gang dag zhi bya dang rab tu zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba de
327b3(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/ji ltar chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba de ltar 'dzin//lha'i bu des de skad bstan pas dge
327b4(dkon brtsegs): slong stong ni sems rnam par grolo//lha'i bu skyong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad
327b5(dkon brtsegs): ces smra so//lha'i bu spobs pa 'di su'i yin/smras pa/spobs pa 'di ni su bag chags thams cad spangs pa dang /tshig gi lam thams cad med pa dang /don
327b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa brjod du med pa dang /mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gi spobs pa yino//smras pa/lha'i bu spobs bya ji ltar skye/smras pa/spobs pa med pa dang /spong
327b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa'i phyiraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/spongs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyiraro/spobs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni spobs pa med
328a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chog/rigs kyi bu 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin zhes smras pa la 'di ni su gzhan gyi rnam par rigs pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang /
328a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o//'di ni su dmigs pa la yang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la dmigs pa med pa'i chos
328a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid la yang mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o//'di ni su chos thams cad la yang shes pa mi 'jug la de shes pas chos gang yang rab tu ma rtogs pa med pa de'i spobs pa'o//
328a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni su gnas pa med pa dang /len pa med pa dang /'dor ba med pa dang /chu bo las brgal ba de'i spobs pa'o//'di ni skye ba med pa la skyes pa dang /'gog pa myed
328a5(dkon brtsegs): la mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba'i spobs pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyisgo 'di skad ces gsol to//bac+doMs//
328a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rgyal po bzang po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyalnga po bzang 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bredas
328a7(dkon brtsegs): po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'dod nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
328b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' nas 'dir 'ongs//de ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'dis ni chos kyi rnam grangs rje su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob ste/de 'dod na/
328b2(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa brgya stong du thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas byAg+h+nAn+da kyang 'di'i spobs pa zad par myi 'gyur//rgyal po bzang gi dre'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//
328b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi de'i blo glos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam pa'i rjesu 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de
328b4(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi rnam pa'i rjesu 'jug pa ni gang yi ge'i rjesu 'jug pa shes pa ste/zhi ba'i blo gros chos
328b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rje su 'jug pa'o//chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i sgo'o//a zhes bya ba las byung ba'o//a zhes bya ba'i mtha'o//ya zhes bya ba ni tshig
328b6(dkon brtsegs): las thams cad las byed//A zhes bya ba nI mi shes pa'o//rnam par mi shes pa'o//chos thams cad ni oM zhes bya ba'i rje su 'jug ste de'i phyir rnam pa'i rjesu 'jug
328b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i gzungs shes bya'o//zhi ba'i blo gros rje su 'jug pa ni de la chos tha rab tsam yang zhugs pa med pa dang /byung ba med pa'o//zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge de dag
329a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'ga' zhig nas lpags nas khong ba'i nang du 'jug pa medo//yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i nang du gnas pa ma yin//yi ge de dag ni byung nas /
329a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin//yi ge de dag ni phan tshun 'bar bar byed pa ma yino//yi ge de dag ni smras kyang rung ma smras kyang rung ste/zad par 'gyur ba 'am/'phel bar
329a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma yin//yi ge de dag ni chos she 'am/chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog/yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa 'am/bkag pa medado//yi ge de dag ni/
329a4(dkon brtsegs): sus kyang byas pa 'am chud gzad pa medado//zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge bgrang ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba yang de bzhi no//sems bgrang ba ji ltar chos thams cad bgrang ba yang de
329a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin//chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa yang de bzhi no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te/bgrang ba med pa ni chos
329a6(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba'o//ji ltar chos bgrang ba nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du/a zhes bya ba'i rjesu 'jug pa yang de lta bu ste/bzod ma nyid nus skyes pa la 'jug pa skye ba med pa la
329a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'o//ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang medado//de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rje su 'jug pa'o//zhi ba'i blo grosu bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spongs
329b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan gcad par mi nus//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rje su rtog so//des chos nyid mi zad par rje su rtog so//des ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de
329b2(dkon brtsegs): lta de ltar chos de dag brjod cing mngon du 'gyuraro//de chos kyi rnam pa'i rje su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug par 'jug/sems can rnam pa'i rje su
329b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to//zhi ba'i blo gros gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyis dri ma med pa yino//bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin//

329b5(dkon brtsegs): po nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yino//bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin//pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyi mi 'dus pa yin//nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi rdzi ba yin//phyir
329b6(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba rnams kyis mi thub pa yin//lus kyis stobs dang ldan pa yin//sems kyis zhum pa med pa yino//skyobs pa mi zad pa yino//bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yino//nges
329b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin//ye shes kyis chags pa med pa yino//blos gting dpag dka' ba yin//bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yino//thos pa rgya mtsho
330a1(dkon brtsegs): blta bu yino//ting 'dzin gyi lhun po dang mtshungs pa yi no//'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yino//'jig rten gyi chos rnams la pad+ma dang mtshung

330b3(dkon brtsegs): yino//dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa yino//'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin//lta ba'i bzhi yi no//'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul ba yin no//
330b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba yino//rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin//mkhas pa thams cad kyis skur ba mi gdab pa yin//lha rnams kyis legs par gsungs

330b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis bsam pa rnams la rje su song ba yin//sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjesu zhugs pa yin no//chos bstan pa la chog mi shes pa yin//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti don du
330b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyer ba yino//chos bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin//tshul khrims rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa med pa yin//bzod pa yongasu dag pas gnod pa med pa yin///
331a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus yongasu dag pas las kyi mtha' legs par mthar phyin pa yino//bsam gtan yongasu dag pas cang shes pa yino//shes rab
331a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pas blo legs par dkar ba yino//tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yino//bsam gtan dang tinge 'dzin drang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das
331a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin//byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yino//dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
331a4(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya

331b7(dkon brtsegs): de la su zhig brtson par bgyid pa de ni ye shes thob par 'gyur te/su brtson par mi bgyid pa des ni ye shes 'thob par mi 'gyur lagaso//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags
332a1(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis rtag tu brtson pa dang partson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o//de ltar na de dag la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur

332a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba la yang dag par rje su bstan mi 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper babyin mngal na mchis pa'i sems can ni mi gdang mi mthong yang skye lags//bcom
332a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub kyang mi mthong mod kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis kyang skye'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di//

332b3(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byung ba li tshe rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po

333b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa legaso legaso//lha'i bu rtswa dang nags tshal ji snyed pa dang /ming gi brda dang /chos kyi brda dang /sgra'i brda ji snyed pa dang /gzugs dang /kha dog gi brda' dag
333b5(dkon brtsegs): rdo sgreng ba dang /sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa dang /ming dang gzugs rab tu brjod pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa

334a1(dkon brtsegs): chos snang ba gung ci yang rung ste/de la gang snang bar mi 'gyur ba de do//de la gzhan dag thos pa la rag las pa'i stobs pa medo//gzhan rgya
334a2(dkon brtsegs): ngor lta ba la rag las pa'i bsnyen pa medo//de mi zad pa dang /mtha'i yas pa dang /thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba dang /thams cad la 'jug pa'i rjesu song ba yin//de la
334a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun chang ba med//chags pa med//lus lci ba med//sems zhum pa medo//de sangs rgyas brgya stong gi skyon sngar ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi
334a4(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gzungs dang shes rab dang /ye shes dang skyobs pa thob po//de ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur

334a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa med pa dang /sems can la chags pa med pa dang /cho sa la chags pa med pa'o//yongasu dag pa gsum b+h+yo rje su/sdong ba yin te/gsum gang zhe na

341a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bton te/zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches

341a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/'di skad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shin tu yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces kyang smraso//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/

341b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang dang ldan pa kun dgu' ba dang /sgra dang mi dang /l+h+wa ma yin da /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mo rangs te/bcom

384b5(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na/bdag rgyal po'i spyan snga'am/rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/skye bo phal po che'i mdun na 'dug par kun tu shes na/byang chub
384b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de ni sa dang po brgyad po dag tu blta ste/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa yin pas des ni sems can yongasasu smin par bya zhing nye du'i mchod pa spang bar bya ba dang //
384b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongasu dag par bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//de la sbyin pas kun nas nyon mongs par
385a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas dang bau pa rA rau//tshul khrims kyis nis gnyis par//smyos pas nIs gsum pa'o//ting 'dzin sa na sa bzhi paro//gzungs kyis nas/
385a2(dkon brtsegs): par ro//mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ni sa drug pa ro//chos ston pas ni sa bdun pa'o//g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pas ni sa brgyad paro//rdo rjes rab 'jom gzhan
385a3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na/bdag skyed mos tshal du son par kun shes na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po dgu po dag tu blta ste/des ni bas
385a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing ni dbu la shes pas ni ma yin pas bdud kyi lcags kyus
385a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu drangs pa yin te/las kyi sgrib pa ni chung ngo //des ni chos smra ba la nye bar 'tsho ba dge bsgrub par bya zhing nang du yang dag 'jog kyang bsgrub par bya'o//dus ni de'i
385a6(dkon brtsegs): las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//dwe la sa dang po la ni spyod pa'i shes pa medo//sa gnyis pa la ni thos pa'i
385a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa medo//sa gsum pa la ni nges pa'i shes pa med do//sa bzhi pa la ni bas mi gtan gyi shes pa medado//sa lnga pa la ni gzungs kyi shes pa med do//sa drug pa
385b1(dkon brtsegs): naso so yang dag por rig pa'i shes pa medo//sa bdun pa la ni bsgrub pa'i shes bya med//sa brgyad pa la ni bkod pa'i shes pa medo//sa dgu pa la ni smon lam gyi shos pa meng//
385b2(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam no/sngon ma mthong ba'i gtsug log khang ngam/grong ngam/yul lam/ljongs mthong na/byang chub sems
385b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de ni sa dang po drug po dag tu blta ste/de ni bar chad mang ba yin pas/des sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom par bya zhing /dad par yang bya/bye ba thams cad la dad pa'i sbyin pas
385b4(dkon brtsegs): mos par yang bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dgu par 'gyur zhing /byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyuraro//gang gis mtshan ma'i bya ba de dag byi dor ma byas
385b5(dkon brtsegs): par yong na/dus ni sa dang por ro//gang gis byi dor byis par mthong na des ni sa gnyis paro//gang gis rkyen gyis brgyan par mthong na des ni sna gsum paro//'khor bzhi po dag
385b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus na de ni se lte ba ro//lha'i 'khor dag 'dus na dris nis drug paro//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yad /byang chub sems dung 'i gang gis rmi lam na/gdugs rnyed na deni
385b7(dkon brtsegs): sa dang po bdun po dag tu ba ste/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyang yod/bar chad kyang mang /mi choms pa yang yin//des ni chos smra ba la brnyas par mi bya ste/des ni
386a1(dkon brtsegs): na la m+mA slob rnam par dag par 'gyu shong /byung chus tungs par dz+ras g+sa gyur//dal ma m+bu gdun pa ma rnas dang mdzag/
386a2(dkon brtsegs): gdugs kyis ni sa gnyis pararo//glo gA'i gdugs kyis ni sku gsum par//ras kyi gdugs kyis ni sa bzhi par//khri bos nI sa lnga bai ro//dril bu gi ser las yongs su
386a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pas nis drug pa //rin pa che'i dra bas glegs pas nis bdun par//bdud kyi las dang mngon par mi brtson pa ni ma gnyig so//rdo rjes dang 'joms gzhan ya byung
386a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na bdag skye bo phal po che'i dbus ni 'dug ste chos ston par kun tu shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa bcu po thams cad du blta s+ho/
386a5(dkon brtsegs): sa dag la bdud kyi las dang las kyi sgrib pa yang ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya zhing des spobs pa yongasu btsal bar bya ste/spobs pa rnyed nas kyang rnam par nges pa sgrub pa'i
386a6(dkon brtsegs): lung 'phrogs par bya'o//dngos po thams cung la lhag par zhen pa med par bya zhing des dngos po rnying pa la yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o//de sa na de
386a7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur//sbyin pa'i gtam ston par kun tu shes nis dang po la gnas por 'gyur ro//dag
386b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni sa gnyis par//thos pa'i gtam gyis ni sa gsum par ro//sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis ni sa bzhi par ro//snyoms par
386b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i gtam gyis ni sa lnga paro//legs par sbyor ba yongasu brjod pa'i gtam gyis ni sna drug pA ro//bdag med po'i gtam gyis ni sa bdun par ro//ye shes bkod pa'i
386b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam gyis ni sa brgyang paro//sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa'i gtam gyis ni sa dgu par ro//lus kyi tshad kyi gtam gyis ni sra bcu pa ro//sa dang po la ni yo byad la rtsol ba dang bcas par/
386b4(dkon brtsegs): ste gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sa gsum pa la ni 'od la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sa bzhi pa la ni nor bdun la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sa lnga pa lani
386b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sa drug pa lnga ni rnam par gtan la dbab pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sa bdun pa la ni nges pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//se brgyad
386b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la ni mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sna dgu pa la ni spyod pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'o//sa bcu pa la ni tshad med pa la rtsom
386b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pa'o//de'i sa dang po la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la bar chad yod do//sa gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims la bar chad yod//sa gsum pa la na mngon par brtsol ba lte bar chad
387a1(dkon brtsegs): yod do//sna bzhi pa la ni dmigs pa la bar chad yod//sa lnga pa la ni rnam pA la bar chad yod//sa drug pa la ni zab mo'i bzod pa la bar chad yod do//sa//
387a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa la ni rnam par 'byed pa'i yis la bar chad yod do//sa brgyad pa la ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la bar chad yod do//sa dgu pa la ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs
387a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la bar chad yod do//sa bcu pa la ni zhing yongasu dag par bya ba lnga bar chad yod do//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na bdag grong
387a4(dkon brtsegs): khyer na gnas par byed par kun tu shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sna brgyad po drug la phyir mi ldog par lung bstan du nye ba yin te/des ni zab mo la mos pa'i gang zag
387a5(dkon brtsegs): lo brten par bya zhing bsnyen bkur bya mchod par bya'o//chos la the tshom mang zhing sgrib pa yod pas des chos smra ba la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed mchod pa byed na 'gyod pa sel
387a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur la/des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyuraro//de las dang po la gnas pa ni sangs rgyasu 'gyur ram//
387a7(dkon brtsegs): 'on to mi 'gyur snyam du byang chub la the tshom za'o//sa gnyis pa la gnas pa ni yang dag par blang ba la the tshom za'o//sa gsum pa la gnas pa ni ye shes la the tshom za'o//
387b1(dkon brtsegs): sa bzhi pa la gnas pa ni ting 'dzin bsgrub pa la the tshom zu'o/sA lta ba la gnas pa ni yang dag pa'i ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes pa la the tshom za'o//sa drug pa la gnas pa ni lam dang 'bras
387b2(dkon brtsegs): bu la the tshom za'o//sa bdun pa la gni sa pa ni nges pa'i tshig lnga the tshom za'o//sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ni rnam par 'phrul pa la the tshom za'o/rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang
387b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na bdag zam pa 'dogs shing chu bo'i dbus su song bar kun tu shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po bdun po dag du blta ste/de la las
387b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pa shas che zhing bdud kyi las kyang shas che bas des ni 'dun pa drag por bya zhing rten pa med pa dang /dbye ba la mi gnas par bya ba dang /tshogs pa la mngon par brtson par
387b5(dkon brtsegs): byas na mi skye ba'i chos kyi snang ba rnam par dag par 'gyu ro//gang gis shes pa'i snang ba la bar chad yod pa de ni sa dang poro//gang gi ji ltar brtson pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la lus nyam
387b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba med ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sa gnyis paro//sems kyi bar dag nyams bde ba med ni byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa gsum par ro//gang la snang ba 'ga' zhig yod
387b7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa bzhi paro//gang la mi 'jigs pa chung ba de ni sa lnga pa ro//gang la yongasu smin par bya ba la bar chad yod pa de ni sa drug paro//gang gis bstan pa
388a1(dkon brtsegs): la bar chud yod pa de ni sa bdun paro//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na bdag gru 'dren par kun tu shes nu byung
388a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' di ni sa dang po drug tu blta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la cha nyams par spyod cing bar chad dang bcas pa yin pas des ni mi gnas par pha rol tu
388a3(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa drug po thams cad la brten par bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//gru'i shing ma sbyangs
388a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dren par kun tu shes na sa dang por ro//sbyangs pas ni sa gnyis paro//sbyar bas ni sa gsum paro//ma sbyar bas ni sa bzhi paro//skye bo zhugs pas ni sa lnga poro//
388a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bas ni sa drug paro//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na sprin las 'brug grag pa 'am/glog 'byung bar bdag gis kun tu shes
388a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po lnga po dag tu blta ste/de la bdud kyi las ni shas che la las kyi sgrib pa ni chung bas des nges par brtag pa mang du bya zhing sdug pa'i dngos
388a7(dkon brtsegs): po yongasu btang ste/gzungs yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//gang gis
388b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin nam glog mthong nas skrag na da ni sA dang por ro//gang mi skrag nad ni sa gnyis byararo//gang chos yid la byed na de ni sa gsum pa ro//gyang sangs rgya sa yid la byed cing dri'i rtse mo na 'dug na
388b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni sa bzhi par ro//gang na mkha' la ni sa lnga par te/bdud kyi las ni ma gtog so//klu 'ongs shing byi dor ram bsgom par byed nas gong ma dag tu'o//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang
388b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na mtshon cha'am go cha rnyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po gsum po dag tu blta ste/de la bdud kyi las dang /las kyi sgrib pa che ba yin

388b6(dkon brtsegs): par ro//rdo rje sor rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' glang gis rmi lam na snod dgra rnyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa bdun po dag tu blta ste/des mtshan ma ji lta ba
388b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du yongasu gdul bar bya'o//de la ni bdud kyi las dang las kyi sgrib pa yang ma nges pa yin pas des bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis mngon par brtson par bya'o//de na de'i las kyi
389a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa de rnam ga par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur//sa drugro pa dag lan phyod ma ldog pa'i chos rnams snang bar bya'o//bdun pa lan
389a2(dkon brtsegs): nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal shes par bya'o//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmo laman bdag sems can rnams la lam ston par kun tu shes na
389a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa bcu po thams cad 'gyur te/des las kyi slob pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya zhing chos smra ba la
389a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /dngos po thams cad yongasu btang bar bya ba dang /brtson 'grus brnam par bya'o//des na de'i khrus kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub

389a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas kyisa'i lam mo zhes bya bas ni sa brgyad pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis nis dgu paro//sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nis bcu pa 'o//sa dang po drug po dag la ni du
389b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi las dang lus kyi sgrib pa yang rtogs par bya'o//saslong ma bzhi po dag la ni skyon de dag mdo//rdo rje sa rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang ni sA rmi ldum du bdag bskyed mos tshal du zhug/

389b4(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya/byang chub rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas pa'i gang zag la yang brten par bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar

389b7(dkon brtsegs): yosu mya ngan las 'das pas 'jigs nas brgyad par ti/sa brgyad po dag la mngon par brtson pa la bdud kyi las kyang rtags par bya'o//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
390a1(dkon brtsegs): /gang gis rmi lam na lo thog phun sum tshogs pa mthong na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po brgyad po dag tu blta ste/sa dang po la gnas pas gnyis pa la mngon par brtson pas

390a4(dkon brtsegs): tog phun sum tshogs pa mthong na de nas gsum paro//grong gi lo tog phun sum tshogs par mthong na sa bzhi pa ro//ljongs kyi lo tog phun sum tshogs par mthong nas lnga pa ro//'dzam+bu gling gi lo thogs phun
390a5(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs par mthong nas drug pa ro//gling bzhi pa'i lo tog phun sum tshogs par mthong nas bdun pa ro//stong gsum pa'i lo tog phun sum tshogs par mthong nas dergyad paro//lo thog yongasu smin

390a7(dkon brtsegs): shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po brgyad po dag las sa gang yang rung bar blta ste/de la las kyi sgrib pa chung la bdud kyi las shas che bas des snying rje chen po yongasu sbyang bar bya zhing //
390b1(dkon brtsegs): /nan la phan par btsun pa dang /phyong ngob mang par yang bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur//glang phye'u gas par byed na de ni sa dang drang/
390b2(dkon brtsegs): ro//gang bud med gso bar byed na de ni sa gnyis paro//gang ma chen po gso bar byed na de ni sa gsum pa ro//gang rims kyis btab pa gus par byed na do nas bzhi par ro//gang skya lcong kyind kyis btab
390b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gso bar byed na de ni sa lnga pa ro//gang shA kra'i nad kyis btab pa gso bar byed na de nI sa drug paro//gang skams nad kyis btab pa gso bar byed na de ni sa bdun pa ro//gang 'byung pos zin pa gso bar
390b4(dkon brtsegs): byed na de ni sa brgyad par te/bdud kyi las ni ma gtog so//snying rje chen po da ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po la spyod cing lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par

390b6(dkon brtsegs): des ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lcong bstan pa bcu po dag tu lung bstan pa la bdud kyi las dang las kyi sgrib pa dge sgrogs par bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/sa dang po la byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /
390b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa la byang chub kyi spyod par lung ston pa dang /sa gsum pa la bzod par lung ston pa dang /sa bzhi pa la smon lam du lung ston pa dang /sa lnga pa la mnyam pa nyid du lung ston pa dang /sa drug pa la
391a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shesu lung ston pa dang /sa bdun pa la mkhas par lung bston pa dang /sa brgyad pa la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lung
391a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dang /sa dgu pa la skye ba gcig gis thogs par lung ston pa dang /sa bcu pa la sangs rgyasu dbang bskur bar lung ston pa'o//des ni snying rje chen po dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs
391a3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa bsten par bya'o//des na byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs
391a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par kun tu shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa phyi ma gsum po dag tu blta ste/des ni bdud kyi las rtogs par bya zhing rtag tu mngon par brtson par yang bya/lhag pa'i bsam pa bsgrub par
391a5(dkon brtsegs): yang bya'o//des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//rdo rjes rab 'joms gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na bum pa
391a6(dkon brtsegs): gang po rnyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa bcu po tha~Md du blta'o//des ni yul ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ste/gal te grong nas rnyed na de ni sa dang po par blta'o//gal te sgo nas rnyed na de ni sa
391a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis par blta'o//gal te lam nas rnyed na da ni sa gsum par blta'o//gal te shing drung nas rnyed na de ni so bzhi par blta'o//gal te 'greng ste rnyed na de ni sa lnga par blta'o//gal te 'dug ste rnyed//
