398a3(dkon brtsegs): sil mo'i 'od kyi rgyun zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa
398a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog ces bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi rgyal po chen por snang ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tha ba dang drin
398a5(dkon brtsegs): dang khong khro ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che gtong ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
398a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yon tan chen po mnga' ba'i blo brnyes pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyis nyi zla'i zil du brlag par mdzad ces bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
398a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bai DUR+Ya sbyangs par snang ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems kyi rgyud kyi blo shin du rgyas pa mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog
398b1(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba'i nags kyi rgyal bu me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'byung gnas shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla lta bu
398b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
398b3(dkon brtsegs): mu tig byi ru 'dra ba'i gdugs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
398b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang rgya mtsho brtsegs pa ltar bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
398b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro la mngon par dgyes pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhe ba bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sde brnyes shes bya ba dang /de bzhin
398b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nyi zla zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gru shugs pa lhun po brtsegs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od ces bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa
398b7(dkon brtsegs): spyan zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal po'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od ces bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi char
399a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thor ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mas srang mdzes par mdzad ces bya ba dang gang bzhin/
399a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya spos dri zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po cher snang ba zhes bya ba dang //de bzhin gshegs pa ma
399a3(dkon brtsegs): khyud ces bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tha ba dang zhe sdang dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i
399a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen po mnga' ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin
399a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ta ma la'i lo ma dang tsan dan gyi rdzab can zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mngon par mkhyen zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mi shes pa rnam
399a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'joms zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ral pA can zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mu tig gi gdugs shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gser
399a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rtog chen po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rtog ces khya ba
399b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po zhes bya ba dang /deng bzhin
399b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa thugs rje can zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig ga rten mdzes shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog ces bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
399b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sreng ge'i blo gros shes bya ba byung ste/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
399b4(dkon brtsegs): ba seng ge'i blo gros kyi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen po dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa
399b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang /mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya
399b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig rten du byung //kun dga' bo de bzhin gshe tshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal ba de'i bston pa la dge
399b7(dkon brtsegs): slong chos kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba shas cher dran pa dang ldan pa/blo gros dang ldan pa/rtogs pa dang ljon pa/shes rab dang ldan pa/brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/
400a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu chen po la mos pa zhig byung ngo //kun dga' bo dri na na slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yos pa'i
400a2(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa lu btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po ga laM daM logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
400a3(dkon brtsegs): te/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon sum du bstod do//'od ni dpag med blo ni mtha' yas mtshungs//gzhan gyi 'od ni gang yang mi gsal te//nyi zla nor bu sna
400a4(dkon brtsegs): tshugs 'od rnams no//'jig rten ldanan lam me lhan ma lags//sems can snying po'i gzugs ni mtha' yas te/de bzhin sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas dbyang ste//tshul
400a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims ting 'dzin shes rab brtson 'grus kyang //khyod 'dra 'jig rten 'di na gzhan ma mchis//zab cing shin tu rgyas pa'i chos brnyes pa//sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ni
400a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho bzhin//des kyang ston la khaM nges pa mi mnga' ste//tha ba zhe sdang spangs nas pa mthar sgrol//ji ltar sangs rgyas mchog gi gzi mtha' yas//mi dbang gzi brjod phyogs
400a7(dkon brtsegs): kun lam mer gda'//de ltar bdag kyang sangs rgyas chos rgyal gyur//skye rgurga dang mchi las rab thar bgyi//sbyin dang dul dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus//bsam
400b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/brtul zhugs 'di dag bdag gis yang dag blang //sems can kun skyob sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi//byang chub zhi mchog mtshungs med tshol
400b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing //sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong du ma'i phrag/gang gA'i bye ma lta bus mtha' yas pa//mgon po de kun bdag gis mchod par bgyi//gang gis rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten khams
400b3(dkon brtsegs): de bas gong du mtha' yas zhing gi khams//de dag kun du 'od ni rab 'byin pa//'di 'dra'i brtson 'grus stobs ni brtsam par bgyi//bdag gis zhing yangs gtso bo dam pa mchog/'dus
400b4(dkon brtsegs): byas 'dir ni brgyan par bgyis nas su//mtshungs pa ma mchis mya ngan 'das dbyings bde//de yang ma mchis pa na rnam par sbyang //phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams//
400b5(dkon brtsegs): deng lhags myur tu bde la dga' bar gyur//sangs rgyas tshad ma 'od ni bdag gi dbang //ma log brtson 'grus stobs ni bskyed par 'chol//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mi chags mkhyen pa
400b6(dkon brtsegs): can//ma khas pa de dag rtag tu bdag sems mkhyen//bdag ni mtshams med mchis te rtag gnas bgyi//smon lo ma stobs las log par yong mi bgyi//kun dga' bo de nas dge
400b7(dkon brtsegs): slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/'di skad ces gsol te/
401a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni blun me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal to/yang dang yang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
401a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing yongasu bsngo ba bgyid na cenas kyang bdug myur du thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /'jig rten dung
401a3(dkon brtsegs): baba'in gu shegs pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bstan du gsol/rnam pa gang dag yis bdag gi sangs
401a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi skyon tan gyi rgyun pakod bdun bum chags pa yong su 'dzin pa d+ma byur ba'i rnam pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yongasu brjod du gsol//kun+da dga'
401a5(dkon brtsegs): du skad ces gsol ba dang //bcom ldan 'das du bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal pos dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de'i
401a6(dkon brtsegs): b+hir+ya dge slong khyod bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi gling gi yon tan gyi rgyun bkrod pa phun sumachags pa yong su ning shig/ngos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag sto bam
401a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshom//de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkong ba'i rgyan phun du mtshogs pa gang thos nas bdag gis rgyad bkang ba thams cad yongs su
401b1(dkon brtsegs): rnarnas pa byung bu banam ldan 'das kyis pa shang drugasal/kun dga' ba dan ma do btsun gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'jog d+hAn dbang thug d+hA/
401b2(dkon brtsegs): podes dge slong de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas don bzhed pa phan pa bzhed pa thugs brtse ba can gyi thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/sangs rgyas kyi tshul mi bcang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la
401b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po bskyed nas lo bye ba tham par sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyun bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa
401b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas/gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par yang dag por rab tu bshad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
401b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhig thub par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
401b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drage zhi bcu
401b7(dkon brtsegs): tham pa thub par gyur to//kun dga' bo de nas dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas ngas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig po dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ston
402a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su bzung nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
402a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bkor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i gran nas song ngo //gong du yang skal pa lngar sangs rgyas
402a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa shin du thag gru che ba shin du gya nom pa/sngon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma byung ba dag kyang
402a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung bar gyur to//smon lam shin du rgya chen po yang btab po//kun dga' bo de ltar dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
402a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig po de dag gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa gang brjod pa de bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa ches lhag par thug gru che ba/ches gya nom pa
402a6(dkon brtsegs): ches dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung ste/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po ga lA ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

402b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po des dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas dro la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
402b2(dkon brtsegs): pi ying rjes su yid rang ba mdzad kyis dge slong gis smros shig/'di ni de'i dris yin gyis 'khor dga' bar gyis shig mgu ba bskyed cig/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig/de
402b3(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa smon lom gyi gnas 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur

402b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa ba mi gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par
402b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i bdag gi smon lam gyi khyad par bcom ldan 'das kyis rodag lnga grwa stan du gsol//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can dmyal ba dag
402b7(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yid btags kyi yul dang /lha ma yin gyi ris mchis par gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
403a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'chang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal to bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag de nus she 'phos nas

403a6(dkon brtsegs): ming dang brdas lha dang mi zhes bgyi ba kri drangasu mchi bar ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi
403a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad gal te tha na sems kyi sku cog thang cig/
403b1(dkon brtsegs): la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye bu khrag khrig brgya stong 'da' ba'i rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba'i pha rol du son par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog kyang chub tu mngon par rdzag/

403b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad tha na sang+yas rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khyig brgya stong du cig char cho se nyan pA'i lha'i rna ba thob par
403b7(dkon brtsegs): mo gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyo bar mi bgyi'o//de com ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zing de
404a1(dkon brtsegs): /sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du btogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa yongasu
404a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba la mkhas par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//
404a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag tha na rang gi lus la yongasu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' zhig bskyed na yang de srid

404a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du 'di lta ste/yang dag pa nyid la nges par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
404a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
404a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can 'ga' zhig gis nyan thos rnams kyi tshad kyi grangs rnyed par 'gyur ba lta na/tha na stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
404b1(dkon brtsegs): sra gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur lnga/skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrangs te grangs rnyed par gyur na yang de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
404b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te pod+mag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
404b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bdag gi 'od blon sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong gi tshad kyi tshad dang ldan par gyur na yud de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
404b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdog bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
404b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad la tshad mchis par gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
404b6(dkon brtsegs): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe tshe'i ched than skal pi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrang ma pas mthong
404b7(dkon brtsegs): phyin par gyur na yang de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i

412a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod spyod gyur na//'jig rten ston pa stobs brnyes par ni 'dra ga ma gyur//shin du rgyas 'od mtshungs pa ma mchis mtha' yas pa//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mgon
412a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'i sangs rgyas zhing kun khyab//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug thams cad rab zhi zhing //sems can dmyal bar dong ba'i me rnams zhi bar bgyi//shin du mdzes
412a4(dkon brtsegs): shing yangs pa'i mig ni phye nas su//mi rnams kun gyi mun nag rnam par bsal bar bgyi//dal ba med pa dag ni ma lus bsal nas su//gzi brjid mtha' yas mtho
412a5(dkon brtsegs): ris lam du gzung bar bgyi//sngon gyi spyod pa yongasu dag par spyad nas ni//mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od ni lam me ma lags shing //nor du'i tshogs dang me dang lha'i 'od rnams
412a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang //mi yi seng ge'i 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan//skyes bu mchog gyur sdug bsngal rnams kyi gter gyur te//phyogs mtshams phyogs na de 'dra'i gzugs ni
412a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shing //dge ba brgya stong dag ni rab tu rdzogs gyur nas//'khor na'ang mchis te sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/sngon gyi rgyal ba rang byung dag la gum bgyis
412b1(dkon brtsegs): te//brtul zhugs dka' thub bye ba dpag med spyod nas ni//ye shes phung po dam pa mchog rab btsal nas su//smon lam stobs ni rdzogs bgyis sems can snying por 'gyur//
412b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan ye shes gzigs pa chags mi mnga'//mi yi dbang po 'dus byas rnam gsum rab mkhyen pa//bdag kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis sbyin gnas mkhas
412b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //mi rnams nang na mi'i 'dren pa mchog gyur cig/mi dbang bdag gis byang chub rab tu thob nas ni//gal te smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dag 'grub ce na//stong gi 'jig rten
412b4(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di rab tu g.yos gyur cing //lha yi tshogs kyis mkha' las me tog char phob cig/sa yang rab tu g.yos te me tog char yang bab//nam mkha' las kyang sil
412b5(dkon brtsegs): snyan rnams kyi sgra yang byung //lha yi tsan dan mdzes pa dag gi phye ma yang //mngon par 'thor bar gyur te 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur////bam po gnyis pa//
412b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan te/kun dga' bo smon lam phun
412b7(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan po'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyu ngo //smon la mi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du byung ba nyung ste/nyung ngu zad kyis ye med pa ni ma yin///
413a1(dkon brtsegs): /kun dga' dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i spyan sngar lha dang brngas pa'i 'jig rten

414a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gnyis ka la gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu spangs nas ngag gis las gang bdag drang gzhan dang gnyis ka la phan par 'gyur ba de la brtson pa

414a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag ngag gi las kyis mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin pa de snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do//sangs rgyas
414b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa de ste yun bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams dang /bde bar sbyar ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad

418a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo chu'i thigs pa gcig lta bur ni/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gastegs pa 'od dpa med kyi nyan thos dang por 'dus pa la mo'u degal gyi bu 'di lta bu'i dge slong

418b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dri snyed cig ces bya ba nas skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig go zhes bya ba'i bar du tshe'i tshad rtogs par sla ba ma yin//kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das
418b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sku tshe'i tshad de ltar dpag tu med de/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe dpag med ces bya'o//kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das
418'a1(dkon brtsegs): dgan glu shegs pa 'ang dpag da dun+ta rjod pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'ib+h+ya chu da rdzogs par sgyu sa de lta da gyu
418'a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di na spel pa'i grangs dang /skyel pa bgreng ba'i brdar btsugs pa de lte bu'i skal pa ban+de lan na//kun dga' bo blonom ldan 'das 'od dpag ma
418'a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyis khams bde ba can zhes bya ba ni 'byur pa/mod pa/bde ba/lo legs pa/nyams dga' ba /lha dang mi mang pos gang ba'o//kun dga'
418'a4(dkon brtsegs): bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can dmyal ba med do//dud 'gro'i skyes gnas med do//yid btags kyi yul myed do//
418'a5(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi ris med do//mi khom par skye ba med do//'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nu snang ba'i rin po che gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rte nAn m+b+hi spyod do//kun
418'a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de ni spos sna tshogs dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldang ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs 'byor pa'o//rin po che'i shing ljon
418'a7(dkon brtsegs): pas legs par brgyan pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i bye sna tshogs sgra yid du 'ong ba can gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o//kun dga' bo rin po che'i
418'b1(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa de dag ni kha dog tha dad pa/kha dog dum/kha dag brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa'o//kun dga' bo don rin po che'i shing ljon pa/gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang /gser gyi
418'b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dag yod do//dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dang /dngul gyi rang bzhin dag yod do//bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog lta bu dang bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin dag yod do//shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang /
418'b3(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi rang bzhin dag yod do//spug gi kha dog lta bu dang /spug gi rang bzhin dag yod//mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu dang mu tig dmar po'i ring bzhin dag yod do//
418'b4(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dang /rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin dag yod do//kha gcig ni gser dang dngul dang /rin po che sna gnyis pa dag yod do//gser drung dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang /
418'b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna gsum pa dag kyang yod do//gser dang dngul dang /bai DAR+Ya dang /shel dang /rin po che sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod do//gser dang dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang /shel dang /
418'b6(dkon brtsegs): spug dang /rin po che sna lnga pa dag kyang yod do//gser dang dngul dang /bai DUR+Ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /mu tig dmar po dang /rin po che sna drug pa dag kyang yod do//
418'b7(dkon brtsegs): gser dang dngul dang /bai TIR+Ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /mu tig dmar po dang /rdo'i snying po dang /rin po che sna bdun pa dag kyang yod do//kun dga' ba den gser gyi shing ljon
419a1(dkon brtsegs): /pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang /sdong po dang /yal ga dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma dang /me tog rnams gsor gyi rang bzhin lnga rtsa ba rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no//
419a2(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi shing ldan pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang /sdong po dang /yal ga dang /lo me dang /'dab ma dang /me tog rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin la 'bras bu rnams bai DUR+Ya'i

419b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams mu tika dmar po'i rang bzhin/'dra ba ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhi ni/me tog rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/'bras bu rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no//kun dga'

420a1(dkon brtsegs): /bzhin 'dab ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/me tog rnams ni dngul gyi rang bzhin/'bras bu rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin no//kun dga' bo shing ljon pa

420a4(dkon brtsegs): dmar po'i rang bzhin la sdong po rnams ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/yal ga rnams glaser gyi rang bzhin/lo ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/'dab ma rnams bai DUR+Ya'i

420b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin/me tog rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ring bzhin/'bras bu rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin no//kun dga' bo shing ljon pa de dag thams cad

421a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos ston to//de bzhin du lto dang /nub dang /byang phyogs dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs mtshams rnam su 'jig
421a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams tha dad pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos ston to//kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri nag po rnams ye

421a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams med do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun du mnyam pa nyams dga' ba/lag mi thal ltar mnyam pa/sa phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis smras pa'o//
421a7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar rab kyi ngos lagan
421b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pari rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa de dag gang na gnas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo 'dri ji snyam du sems/'di ni ri'i rgyal po
421b2(dkon brtsegs): ri rab kyi gong ma 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang //tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /

425b1(dkon brtsegs): san rnas zhug ng+gAr 'bo nga/ rdzos bu 'dod pa ma na nargyun rmA bAm+ban+dan stong dums sa da n+da/ d+hA/

426a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ni ma gtogs//kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dpe na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal ba'i mdun na ma ma rA sa dang /ma zam ni lam mA ma yin//spyan/
426a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/lhang ma yin zhing mi 'jigs pa ma yin la 'od gsal ba ma yin no//de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mdun na sgra'i dbang po brgya byin yang 'di lta ste

426a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o//kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ngan snga dro'i dus nye bar gnaso ba'i tshe phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khrug shing kun du
426a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste de dag gis rin po che'i shing ldan pa kra ba blta na sdug pa kha dog tha dad pa kha dag du ma yod pa/lha'i spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyis dus
426a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag bskyod kun du bskyod/bskul kun du bskul nas de dag les me tog rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsung can blta na sdug pa dag rin po tsho' sa chen po de la 'phrul te/ma
426b1(dkon brtsegs): tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du mi 'greng ba bdun srid du bkram par 'gyuraro//'di lta ste dper na skyes bu sa la me tog 'gams mkhas pa zhig gis lhag pa gnyis kas bkram ste/
426b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing blta na sdug go/de bzhin du me tog bsung dang kha dog tha dad pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du mi 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur//
426b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni 'jam pa ste/dpe tsam du na gos ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba'o//de dag na rkang pa 'jog pa na skor bzhi tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing rkang pa 'degs pa
426b4(dkon brtsegs): na sor bzhi tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyuraro//snga dro'i dus 'das nas me tog de dag kyang ma lus par med par 'gyur te/de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba dang /nyams dka' ba dang /

426b6(dkon brtsegs): snga dro ji lta bar nyi ma'i gung dang /phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe dang /mtshan mo yang srod dang nam gyi gung dang tho rangs kyang de bzhin no//spos dang /dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i rlung de dag
426b7(dkon brtsegs): langs nas sems can de dag la reg ni 'di lta ste dper na/dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing
427a1(dkon brtsegs): /nA de bzhin gshegs pas bskrad pa mya gtogs par mo dang nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /gazla' dang /rgyu skar dang /skar ma'i gzugs dang /mun pa mun nag gi ming
427a2(dkon brtsegs): du gdags pa yod medo//nyin mo dang mtshan mor gdags pa yang yong med khyim yongasu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yong mdo//kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can

427b1(dkon brtsegs): khams dbang ba can nos bya ste rgyus par nom ston//kun dga' bo rgyus par bstan na ni skal ba zad zad du 'jog rten gyi khams bang ba can gyi bod po'i rgyu rnams yongasasu brjod kyang bad ca/

427b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag ste//de dag skal pa'am 'on tu lhag par ni//bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab brjod kyang //bsngags pa'i phreng ba rab tu brjod pa ni//skal

428a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med do//kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs ra rAn+da yang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

431b7(dkon brtsegs): gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grog pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du rna nad kyis mi btab par shes par byor//sems can dpag tu med grangs med pas mar gyis
432a1(dkon brtsegs): /mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med chod med brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mig nad kyis
432a2(dkon brtsegs): me btab par shes par bya'o//kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tsher ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna nad kyis mi btab par shre
432a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o//sems can gang dag byang chub kyis shing de'i 'bras bu'i ro myong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par

439b1(dkon brtsegs): kram pa dang /me tog gi phreng bas kun tu mdzes par byas pa dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi ka ba'i phreng gis gang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pasnga sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis
439b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'ongs mthong lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di las gzhan pa'i bye'i tshogs

443a1(dkon brtsegs): /phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/de'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcung/

446b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te//sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen zhes tshig tu brjod/brgya lam na ni mi
446b4(dkon brtsegs): lus rnyed la//brgya lam+ba na ni/sangs rgyas 'byung b.ra'agyur//dad dang /shes rab yun ring rnyed par 'gyur/
446b5(dkon brtsegs): de bas don thob bya phyir brtson 'grus bskyed//gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni//bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur//
446b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub mas bskyed pa/de dag 'das pa'i dus na ded dang shes//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bri shad pa na//sems
446b7(dkon brtsegs): can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni
447a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob glo/dge slong brgyud bcu ni lenu pa med pa'i zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
447a2(dkon brtsegs): grol lo//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu ldan mo bri'i chos la bzod pa thab po//lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrig khrig
447a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu ni sngon sems ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
447a4(dkon brtsegs): gshigs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'o/phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu
447a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngo bar byed do//de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs bar byas te
447a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyings shes bya ba /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
447a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshig so po mar me mdzod las bzod pa thob ste/blan
447b1(dkon brtsegs): mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad nu de bzhin gshegs pa/'od dpag med kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
447b2(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyong ba na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/sngon
447b3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug hu goyos te/
447b4(dkon brtsegs): cho 'bru'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyang kun du snang ngo //me tog man da rA ba dag kyang so la pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to//lha dang
447b5(dkon brtsegs): mi'i si li snyan rnams klung rab tu grog par gyur to//'og min gyi gnas gyi bar du yang rjes su yid dang /do zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par gyur
447b6(dkon brtsegs): toba~M tsi ma ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi thim pa dang
447b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lho dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi
448a1(dkon brtsegs): pa smra sa cing blag rgyam las zhin rgyas kyi zhing gi
